en-US: but if what her participants told her is true , not all dentists are heeding their own professional body's advice .

zh-CN: 大多数参与研究的人表示一年至少拍了一次x光。
en-US: most of those who took part in the study reported having at least one x-ray a year .

zh-CN: 克劳斯医生的工作及时地提醒了我们，拍x光是有危险的，牙医应该保守地使用它们，这样看来病人们对x光的疑虑并不是所谓的妄想。
en-US: dr claus's work , then , is a timely reminder that x-rays are dangerous , that dentists should use them sparingly and that patients who have suspicions about their use are not necessarily paranoid .

zh-CN: “平坦的世界”听起来好像来自黑暗时代的东西。
en-US: a flat world sounds like something from the dark ages .

zh-CN: 的确，平坦的油价世界，对某些国家来说将是一个非常不愉快的前景。
en-US: indeed , a world of flat oil prices could , for some , be a very unpleasant place .

zh-CN: 油价缺乏上扬趋势，已经对主要产油国的行为产生了影响，例如沙特阿拉伯、卡塔尔、科威特、阿联酋、阿曼和巴林。
en-US: the lack of upward movement has already had an impact on the behaviour of major oil-producing nations such as saudi arabia , qatar , kuwait , uae , oman and bahrain .

zh-CN: 这些国家放慢了预算扩张的步伐，从去年平均增长14%，降到今年的不到3%。
en-US: these nations have slowed the pace of budgetary expansion from a regional average of 14 per cent growth last year to less than 3 per cent this year .

zh-CN: 穆迪(Moody's)的一份报告计算了要实现可覆盖支出计划的财政收入，布伦特原油价格（盈亏平衡价）需要有多高。
en-US: a report from moody's calculates the brent crude oil price required to generate the revenue needed to cover spending plans ( the break-even price ) .

zh-CN: 2008年以来，支出增速超过翻番的油价。
en-US: since 2008 spending has more than kept pace with a doubling oil price .

zh-CN: 而这些支出计划仍在扩张，即便油价已经止步。
en-US: and those spending plans are still rising , even if the oil price is not .

zh-CN: 联合国预测，海湾地区的劳动力人数将以每年10%的速度增长至2020年。
en-US: the un forecasts that the labour force in the region will grow at 10 per cent annually until 2020 .

zh-CN: 创造就业机会的投资至关重要。
en-US: investment in job creation is crucial .

zh-CN: 重大的开支缩减计划将难以推行。
en-US: significant spending cuts will be hard to push through .

zh-CN: 例如，阿曼的盈亏平衡价是100美元；巴林是130美元。目前油价是109美元。
en-US: for example , the break-even price for oman is $100 ; for bahrain it is $130 . oil is trading at $109 .

zh-CN: 一旦油价和海湾各国政府的财政收入骤降，多数海湾国家还可以依赖其主权财富基金。
en-US: should oil prices and regional government revenues suddenly drop , most of the gulf nations can fall back on their sovereign wealth funds .

zh-CN: 其主权财富基金仅相当于两年的支出。
en-US: its swf amounts to just two years of spending .

zh-CN: 巴林的石油产值仅占其国内生产总值(GDP)的四分之一，但贡献了财政收入的87%。
en-US: in bahrain oil accounts for only a quarter of its gdp but it is 87 per cent of revenues .

zh-CN: 美国银行指出，巴林是海湾地区唯一运行预算赤字的经济体。
en-US: it is the only gulf economy running a budget deficit , as bank of america points out .

zh-CN: 自2008年以来，其债务与GDP的比率已增加一倍多，达61%。
en-US: since 2008 its debt to gdp ratio has more than doubled , to 61 per cent .

zh-CN: 就目前而言，油价仍属坚挺。
en-US: for now , oil is firm .

zh-CN: 摩根士丹利资本国际(MSCI)海湾国家股指今年迄今已上升10%，一部分原因是卡塔尔和阿联酋即将被纳入MSCI新兴市场股指，吸引外资流入。
en-US: msci ' s index of gulf country stock exchanges has risen by a tenth this year , partly on inflows into qatar and uae before their entry into msciﾒs emerging markets index .

zh-CN: 针对巴林的信用违约互换（CDS，潜在的预警信号）的价格自去年10月以来已经下降，说明信用市场并不担心。但如果油价保持平坦，压力将会上升。
en-US: credit default swaps on bahrain , a potential warning indicator , have pulled back since october , suggesting credit markets are unconcerned . but if the world stays flat , the pressure will rise .

zh-CN: BP成立新公司角逐美国能源业务
en-US: bp splits off us energy unit

zh-CN: 英国石油(BP)即将创办一家新公司，来管理其在美国的陆上石油和天然气资产。此举旨在帮助BP更有效地与主导美国页岩气行业的中小规模独立企业展开竞争。
en-US: bp is creating a new business to manage its us onshore oil and gas assets , in an effort to compete more effectively with the smaller independent companies that dominate america ’ s shale industry .

zh-CN: 分析师们表示，如果新成立的美国公司业绩得不到改善，BP最终仍可以把它卖掉。
en-US: analysts said bp could ultimately sell the new unit if its performance did not improve .

zh-CN: 去年，BP表示，它计划在2010年深水地平线事故后实施的380亿美元资产处置计划基础上，到明年底再剥离100亿美元的资产。
en-US: last year , the oil group said it planned to divest $10 bn of assets by the end of next year – on top of the $38 bn disposal programme implemented in the wake of the deepwater horizon disaster in 2010 .

zh-CN: BP首席执行官戴德立(BobDudley)表示，BP不大可能卖掉这家新成立的美国公司，称其“长期而言仍将是BP资产组合中的一个关键组成部分”。
en-US: bob dudley , bp’s chief executive , played down the possibility of a sale , saying that the new us business “will remain a critical part of bp’s portfolio over the long term ” .

zh-CN: 然而，他补充表示，此举“为我们提供了选择的机会”。
en-US: however , he added that the move “ creates optionality for us ” .

zh-CN: 新成立的美国公司将为BP所有，但该公司将与公司其余部分分开运营，由单独的管理团队领导，并从2015年起单独发布财报。
en-US: bp will own the us unit , but it will operate separately from the rest of the company , be led by a separate management team and publish separate financials from 2015 .

zh-CN: BP此项计划凸显出，包括埃克森美孚和荷兰皇家壳牌在内的石油大企业，在试图从美国页岩气盈利方面遇到重重困难。
en-US: bp’s plan reflects the difficulties that oil majors including exxonmobil and royal dutch shell have had in trying to make money from us shale gas .

zh-CN: 页岩气繁荣压低了美国天然气价格，让这些大企业都受到冲击。
en-US: all have been hit by the driving down of us natural gas prices caused by the shale boom .

zh-CN: 战争阴云重创俄罗斯股市
en-US: war fears decimate russia stocks

zh-CN: 对乌克兰战争的担忧抹去了莫斯科股票交易所十分之一的市值，并导致卢布汇率跌至历史新低。与此同时，西方纷纷谴责俄罗斯对克里米亚逐渐升级的侵略行为。
en-US: fears of a war in ukraine wiped a 10 th off the value of moscow ’ s stock exchange and sent the rouble tumbling to an all-time low as the west scrambled to counter russia ’ s creeping invasion of crimea .

zh-CN: 投资者对俄罗斯资产的回避促使莫斯科股市下跌了10.8%，这是自2008年金融危机以来最大的单日跌幅。
en-US: investors fled russian assets , with stocks in moscow falling by 10.8 per cent , their biggest daily fall since the 2008 financial crisis .

zh-CN: 全球市场也对发生冲突的可能性做出了回应，一些严重依赖俄罗斯和乌克兰的大宗商品——比如小麦、石油和欧洲天然气——价格飙升。
en-US: global markets also reacted to the prospect of a conflict and there was a jump in the price of commodities that are heavily dependent on russia and ukraine , such as wheat , oil and european natural gas .

zh-CN: 本来就已是最疲软货币之一的卢布下跌近3%，跌至1美元兑36.90卢布的创纪录低点。随后俄罗斯央行出乎市场意料地提升了利率，并支出至少70亿美元支撑卢布汇率。
en-US: the rouble , already one of the worse performing currencies , fell nearly 3 per cent to a record low of rbs 36.90 against the dollar before the central bank surprised the market by raising rates and spending at least $7bn propping up the rouble .

zh-CN: 市场动荡之际，俄罗斯对克里米亚的占领令紧张态势进一步加剧。
en-US: the market turmoil came as tensions continued to rise over russia ’ s occupation of crimea .

zh-CN: 乌克兰国防部表示，该国在克里米亚的部队接到了俄军的最后通牒，要求他们在今天当地时间凌晨5点前向俄军投降，否则将遭遇俄军攻击。
en-US: ukraine ’ s defence ministry said its forces in crimea had received an ultimatum from russian forces to surrender to them by 5am local time today or face attack .

zh-CN: 俄罗斯方面否认了这一声明，称这是“一派胡言”。
en-US: russia dismissed the claims as “ utter nonsense ” .

zh-CN: 今年迄今卢布汇率下滑近11%，这引发了对俄罗斯的通胀担忧。在俄罗斯，人们仍对1997-98年和2008-09年的卢布贬值有着痛苦记忆。
en-US: the near 11 per cent slide in the rouble so far this year has raised fears of inflation in russia , where people have painful memories of devaluations in 1997-98 and 2008-09 .

zh-CN: 经济学家们表示，在更高的通胀水平、不断攀升的利率以及资本外逃的共同作用下，本已困难重重的俄罗斯经济可能陷入衰退。
en-US: economists said the combination of higher inflation , rising interest rates and capital flight could tip the struggling russian economy into recession .

zh-CN: 摩根士丹利首席俄罗斯经济学家雅各布•内尔表示：“这个安全方面的冲击将令俄罗斯陷入轻度衰退。”
en-US: “ this is a security shock which will push russia into a mild recession , ” jacob nell , chief russia economist at morgan stanley .

zh-CN: 由此产生的冲击波已传遍全球股市。
en-US: the impact rippled across global stock markets .

zh-CN: 随着投资者寻求政府债券等更安全资产，股价出现了大幅下跌。
en-US: equities tumbled as investors fled to safer assets such as government bonds .

zh-CN: 富时环球股票指数下跌了1.4%，逆转了上周的增幅。纽约收市时，标普500指数(S&P500)下跌了0.74%。
en-US: the ftse all-world share index fell 1.4 per cent – reversing last week ’ s gains and by lunchtime in new york , the s&p 500 was down 1 per cent .

zh-CN: 小麦价格跃升了4.7%，布伦特(Brent)原油价格上涨了2.1%，而英国天然气期货跃升了近10%。
en-US: wheat leapt 4.7 per cent , brent crude oil rose 2.1 per cent and uk natural gas futures jumped by nearly 10 per cent .

zh-CN: 针对乌克兰和俄罗斯债务违约的保险成本跃升了15%。
en-US: the cost of insuring ukrainian and russian debt against a default jumped by 15 per cent .

zh-CN: 中国罢工导致固铂轮胎损失2900万美元
en-US: cooper tire takes $29 m hit from chinese strikes

zh-CN: 总部位于美国俄亥俄州的固铂轮胎报告称，中国的劳工行动导致其在截至去年9月30日的3个月期间损失2900万美元。这也让人罕见地一瞥中国劳资纠纷的经济影响。
en-US: chinese industrial action cost cooper tire $29 m in the three months to september 30 , the ohio-based company reported , shedding rare light on the economic impact of a labour dispute in china .

zh-CN: 中国各地尽管经常发生罢工，但通常发生在不知名的供应商中。
en-US: while strikes are common across china , they typically occur at little-known suppliers .

zh-CN: 少数发生在大型跨国公司中的劳工骚乱，对跨国公司整体运营的影响通常又不足以迫使其披露某一次罢工的财务成本。
en-US: on those rare occasions when labour unrest disrupts operations at a large multinational , the impact on a global company ’ s overall operations is usually not material enough to force disclosure about a specific strike ’ s financial cost .

zh-CN: 发生在位于山东的固铂成山轮胎公司（固铂旗下的合资公司）的这场为时7个月的罢工，让阿波罗轮胎公司(ApolloTyres)对固铂24亿美元的收购计划告吹。该笔收购原本会是印度对美国企业规模最大的一笔收购。
en-US: the seven-month industrial action at cooper ’ s joint venture chengshan tire factory in shandong province derailed a $2.4bn bid by apollo tyres for cooper , in what would have been the largest indian takeover of a us company .

zh-CN: 固铂有高达四分之一的营收和利润来自发生罢工的固铂成山。
en-US: it also occurred at a facility that generates as much as one quarter of cooper ’ s revenue and profit .

zh-CN: 在这份延迟发布的三季度盈利报告中，固铂表示，罢工导致其因减产损失2200万美元，因“生产效率低下”进一步损失700万美元。
en-US: in a delayed third-quarter earnings report , cooper said the strike had cost it $22m in reduced production and a further $7m in “ manufacturing inefficiencies ” .

zh-CN: 固铂在该季度还产生了500万美元与收购交易失败有关的费用。
en-US: the company incurred a further $5m in expenses related to the failed transaction during the quarter .

zh-CN: 受罢工事件的影响，固铂三季度销售额同比下跌25%，至8.32亿美元。
en-US: the losses in shandong contributed to a 25 per cent year-on-year fall in third-quarter sales , to $832m .

zh-CN: 营运利润比2012年缩水近80%，至2800万美元。
en-US: operating profit contracted almost 80 per cent compared with 2012 , to $28m .

zh-CN: 在7-9月期间，固铂报告净亏损16.8万美元，而上年同期该公司报告净盈利7400万美元。
en-US: cooper reported a net loss of $168,000 for the july - september period , compared with a net profit of $74 m a year earlier .

zh-CN: 固铂成山的管理层和工人反对阿波罗的收购计划，称收购会让固铂背上太多债务。
en-US: management and the workforce at chengshan had opposed the proposed takeover by apollo , arguing that it would saddle cooper with too much debt .

zh-CN: 苏格兰独立运动昨日遭遇一个挫折，苏格兰最大的两家雇主就独立带来的风险发出警告，这个迹象显示企业准备在这个问题上打破沉默。
en-US: the campaign for scottish independence suffered a setback yesterday when two of the country’s biggest employers warned on the risks of a yes vote , in a sign that companies are ready to break their silence on the issue .

zh-CN: 在苏格兰拥有5000名雇员的保险公司标准人寿表示，宪法的改变可能促使它将大部分业务转移出苏格兰，这是一家大型企业在“苏独”问题上最重大的介入。
en-US: standard life , the insurance company that employs 5,000 people north of the border , said constitutional changes could prompt it to shift large parts of operations out of scotland in the most significant intervention by a big company .

zh-CN: 在苏格兰拥有1.2万名雇员的苏格兰皇家银行(RBS)也警告称，如果投票结果支持独立，可能损害该行信用评级，尽管该行首席执行官坚称，该行将对公投结果保持“中立”。
en-US: royal bank of scotland , which has 12,000 staff in the country , also warned a vote for independence could damage its credit rating , although its chief executive insisted the group would remain “ neutral ” on the outcome of the referendum .

zh-CN: 因为担心得罪顾客和员工，迄今没有几家企业愿意投入有关独立的辩论。
en-US: until now few companies have been willing to enter the independence debate for fear of upsetting customers and staff .

zh-CN: 然而，如果民意调查继续显示，在9月的公投临近之际，民族主义者不断缩小差距，那么担心独立后果的企业打破沉默的可能性会加大。
en-US: however , if opinion polls continue to show nationalists narrowing the gap ahead of the vote in september then groups worried about the implications are more likely to speak out .

zh-CN: 自1825年起总部一直设在苏格兰的标准人寿，已开始在英格兰注册新的实体，这将为平稳“南下”做好准备。
en-US: standard life , which has been based in scotland since 1825 , has started to register new entities in england , which would smooth any move south .

zh-CN: 知情人士表示，苏格兰货币的前景是该公司最大的担忧。
en-US: the future of the currency is its biggest concern , say people familiar with the matter .

zh-CN: 苏格兰皇家银行在年报中表示：“假如投票结果支持苏格兰独立，可能对本集团的信用评价造成重大影响。”
en-US: the royal bank of scotland said in its annual report : “ a vote in favour of scottish independence would be likely to significantly impact the group ’ s credit ratings . ”

zh-CN: 游说团体TheCityUK表示，苏格兰的金融和专业服务业在规模上仅次于伦敦金融城(CityofLondon)，提供了15万就业岗位，占苏格兰经济的近13%。
en-US: second in size only to the city of london , the scottish financial and professional services industry supports 150,000 jobs and accounts for nearly 13 per cent of the scottish economy , says lobby group thecityuk .

zh-CN: 中国官方否认策划人民币贬值
en-US: china denies direct role in renminbi ’ s decline

zh-CN: 人民币兑美元汇率出现自2005年中国实施汇改以来的最大单周跌幅。一些经济学家将这解读为中国央行对外汇投机者发出的一次警告。
en-US: the renminbi has suffered its steepest weekly fall against the us dollar since china reformed its exchange rate system in 2005 in a move that some economists have interpreted as a warning from the country’s central bank to currency speculators .

zh-CN: 昨日，人民币汇率连续第7天下跌，人民币兑美元汇率收跌0.02%，至1美元兑6.1244元人民币，盘中一度创下去年8月初以来的低点。
en-US: the renminbi posted its seventh straight daily decline yesterday , sliding 0.02 per cent against the dollar to close at 6.1244 having hit its lowest level since early august in intraday trading .

zh-CN: 经济学家和投资者较认可的一个解读是，中国央行策划了这波人民币贬值，因为其对近几月的巨额资金流入感到担心，想向市场表明单向押注人民币汇率走势是行不通的。
en-US: one popular theory among economists and investors is that the people ’ s bank of china engineered the depreciation because it was concerned about huge inflows of capital in recent months and wanted to show markets that trading the currency was not a one-way bet .

zh-CN: 2012年末以来，分析师一直预测人民币会持续升值。
en-US: analysts had been forecasting a continuation of the appreciation seen since late 2012 .

zh-CN: 然而，中国央行在其就人民币突然贬值发表的首份官方声明中表示，这是市场力量的反映，不应过分解读。
en-US: however , the chinese central bank used its first official statement on the sudden weakening of the country’s currency to say the sell-off was a reflection of market forces and should not be over-interpreted .

zh-CN: 中国央行下属的中国国家外汇管理局不承认在引导汇率走势方面发挥了什么作用。
en-US: the state administration of foreign exchange , an agency under the central bank , did not acknowledge any role in guiding the currency .

zh-CN: 该局表示：“近期人民币汇率走势是市场主体调整前期人民币交易策略的结果。
en-US: “ the recent movement of the renminbi exchange rate is the result of market players adjusting their near-term trading strategies , ” it said .

zh-CN: “这次汇率波动幅度与发达和新兴市场货币的波动相比属于正常波动。
en-US: “ the degree of exchange rate volatility is normal by the standards of developed and emerging markets . ”

zh-CN: 中国央行主管的报纸《金融时报》报道称，在今年初出现巨大的投资与贸易流入之后，2月份趋势发生了明显的逆转。
en-US: after huge investment and trade inflows at the start of the year , there was a clear reversal of the trend in february , according to china financial news , a central bank newspaper .

zh-CN: 中国国际金融公司(CICC)经济学家彭文生说：“风险偏好下降的原因多少在于逊于预期的增长数据。另外，房地产市场引起的担忧也有所加剧。”
en-US: “ risk appetite has weakened somewhat because of lower-than-expected growth data. also , concerns about the property market have increased , ” said peng wensheng , an economist with china international capital corp , the research group .

zh-CN: 然而，一直严格管控汇率的中国央行在这波人民币贬值中的作用是显而易见的。
en-US: however , the hand of the ­ chinese central bank , which keeps a tight grip on the exchange rate , has been evident .

zh-CN: 上周人民币汇率开始下跌时，是中国央行在稳步下调人民币汇率中间价，而银行和企业则在不断将人民币汇率水平推高至中间价上方。
en-US: when the currency started falling last week it was the central bank that steadily lowered its daily reference rate , while banks and companies continued to trade it at a stronger level .

zh-CN: 只是在过去两天里，市场交易给出的人民币汇率才降至中国央行设定的中间价下方。这一迹象表明，北京方面目前至少在一定程度上打破了人民币单边升值预期。
en-US: it was only over the past two days that the market-traded exchange rate fell below the daily rate set by the central bank – a sign that beijing has , for now , succeeded in breaking at least some of the one-way bets on appreciation .

zh-CN: 中国央行周二发布的数据显示，今年初流入中国的资金规模十分庞大。
en-US: china faced immense capital inflows at the start of this year , according to data published on tuesday by the central bank .

zh-CN: 今年1月，银行在在岸市场从想持有人民币的客户手中净买入了730亿美元的外汇，创下了最大的单月买入量。
en-US: banks bought a net $73 bn of foreign currency in the onshore market from their clients who wanted renminbi in january , the biggest monthly amount on record .

zh-CN: 去年年中，中国的巨额外汇储备增加了5000亿美元，达到3.8万亿美元。自那以来，资金一直在加速流入中国。
en-US: inflows have been accelerating since the middle of last year when china ’ s mountain of foreign exchange reserves grew by $500 bn to $3.8tn .

zh-CN: 昆明暴恐袭击考验中国新疆政策
en-US: beijing faces up to failure in xinjiang

zh-CN: 针对西北偏远地区新疆持续多年的叛乱，中国采取的遏制战略遭遇戏剧性的失败，这给北京方面带来严重的政策挑战。
en-US: the dramatic failure of china ’ s containment strategy for a long-running insurgency in the remote northwestern region of xinjiang poses a grave policy challenge for beijing .

zh-CN: 矛盾的一方是反对中国控制其能源丰富的家园的维吾尔族穆斯林。这一矛盾上周六晚间在中国腹地爆发：地处中国西南的昆明市遭遇恐怖袭击，导致33人丧生。
en-US: the conflict , involving muslim uighurs who object to chinese control of their energy-rich homeland , burst into the country’s heartland in a terrorist attack that claimed the lives of 33 people in the southwestern city of kunming on saturday night .

zh-CN: 挥舞砍刀的袭击者在该市主要火车站发起的血腥攻击还令人质疑：中国政府对维吾尔“分裂主义”的强硬回应，是否只是成功地制造了一场更加棘手的危机？
en-US: the deadly assault by machete-wielding assailants , who struck at the city ’ s main railway station , also raises questions about whether the chinese government ’ s hardline response to uighur “ separatism ” has succeeded only in creating a more intractable crisis .

zh-CN: 官方的新华社昨晚称，中国警方已逮捕3名参与攻击的人员，并确定这个团伙的头目是阿不都热依木▪库尔班。
en-US: last night the official xinhua news agency said chinese police had arrested three people involved in the attack and identified the group ’ s leader as abdurehim kurban .

zh-CN: 警方上周六在火车站当场击毙另外4名犯罪嫌疑人，并抓获一人。
en-US: authorities killed another four suspects and apprehended a fifth at the railway station on saturday .

zh-CN: 没有任何组织声称对这次袭击负责，但北京方面一贯坚称，其在新疆的斗争对象是未指明的“分裂主义”分子，而不是“维吾尔”活动人士。
en-US: no group has claimed responsibility for the attack but beijing has always maintained its conflict in xinjiang is with unspecified “ separatist ” elements rather than with “ uighur ” activists .

zh-CN: 这种区别很重要，因为它暗示，具有重要战略意义的地区（如新疆和西藏）的紧张局势要归咎于境外敌对势力，而不是中国政府自身的政策。
en-US: the distinction is important because it suggests that external or hostile forces – rather than the government ’ s own policies – are to blame for tensions in strategically important regions such as xinjiang and tibet .

zh-CN: 去年新疆发生的若干冲突导致100多人丧生。这些冲突大多发生在偏远地区，有关具体事件相互矛盾的报道无法得到独立核实。
en-US: more than 100 people were killed in clashes in xinjiang last year , mostly in remote areas where conflicting accounts of the incidents could not be independently checked .

zh-CN: 昆明发生的大屠杀是去年10月以来这一矛盾第二次蔓延至新疆以外。去年10月，3名维族人驾车在天安门广场冲撞人群。
en-US: the massacre in kunming is the second time the conflict has spilled beyond xinjiang ’ s borders since october , when three uighurs drove a vehicle into a crowd in tiananmen square .

zh-CN: 虽然那是一起发生在中国首都市中心的具有高度象征意义的攻击，但它仅导致两名路人丧生。
en-US: although a highly symbolic attack at the centre of china ’ s capital , it killed only two bystanders .

zh-CN: 与此形成对照的是，上周六发生的大屠杀在地点和死亡人数两方面都令人震惊。
en-US: saturday ’ s mass killing , by contrast , was shocking for both its location and its death toll .

zh-CN: 昨日昆明天气晴朗、鲜花盛开，令人对不到48小时前发生的惨剧更加觉得难以置信。
en-US: in kunming yesterday clear blue skies and blooming flowers added to the sense of disbelief at what had occurred less than 48 hours earlier .

zh-CN: “伤亡人数和暴力行为的冲击力都达到空前的高度，”中国现代国际关系研究院反恐问题专家李伟表示。
en-US: “ the number of casualties and the impact of the violence are unprecedentedly high , ” said li wei , an antiterrorism expert at the china institute of contemporary international relations .

zh-CN: “恐怖威胁显然正蔓延到新疆以外。这次袭击是经过精心组织策划的。参与者之前受到良好的训练。”
en-US: “ the terrorist threat is clearly moving beyond xinjiang. the attack was carefully organised and planned . the people involved had been well trained . ”

zh-CN: 此次恐怖袭击的一些受害者在昆明市第一人民医院九楼接受治疗，一些官方媒体所称的“中国的9?11事件”的野蛮性在这里可见一斑。
en-US: the savage nature of what some state media have called “ china ’ s 9/11 ” was on graphic display on the ninth floor of the number one kunming people ’ s hospital , where victims of the terror attack are recovering .

zh-CN: 大部分伤员都是头部被砍伤，他们剃光头发的头皮上满是纵横交错的长疤痕和缝线。
en-US: most of the wounded were slashed in the head , their shaven scalps now criss-crossed with long scars and stitches .

zh-CN: 曹念描述了他23岁的女友王鸿丽后脑被砍中的那一刻。
en-US: cao nian described the moment when his 23-year-old girlfriend , wang hongli , was struck in the back of the head .

zh-CN: “我在车站给她送行，就在这时（攻击者）出现了。”他说。
en-US: “ i was seeing her off at the station when [ the attackers ] appeared , ” he said .

zh-CN: “起初是一个人，然后出现了六个人。我们蹲下来时，他们砍中了她。”两人踉踉跄跄逃出车站，跑了大约400米才得到救护。
en-US: “ first there was one , then six. we were crouching down when they hit her . ” the two staggered out of the station , running some 400 metres to find medical help .

zh-CN: 未在袭击中受伤的曹念说话时，一辆推车从他熟睡的女友身旁推过，车上是另一名伤者。
en-US: mr cao , who was not injured in the attack , spoke as another casualty was wheeled by his sleeping girlfriend .

zh-CN: 此人头部右侧有一道深深的伤痕，伤口已被缝合。
en-US: a deep scar cut across the right side of the victim ’ s head , which had been stitched .

zh-CN: 他的耳内仍有明显的血块。
en-US: a pool of blood was still evident in his ear .

zh-CN: “我们都对这场悲剧感到震惊，”纳舟怀（音译）表示。他是一名回族商人，此刻正在顺城清真寺等待正午祈祷开始。
en-US: “ we are all appalled by this tragedy , ” said na zhouhuai , a muslim trader from china ’ s hui ethnic group , as he waited for midday prayers to begin at the shuncheng mosque .

zh-CN: “他们杀害了普通人——像我们这样的普通人。我们相信，你甚至不应该杀死一只蚂蚁。”
en-US: “ they killed ordinary people – ordinary people like us here. we believe that you should not even kill an ant . ”

zh-CN: 顺城清真寺外似乎没有警察执勤，昆明火车站的安保也令人惊讶的宽松，这里再次挤满了旅客。
en-US: there was no police presence outside mr na ’ s mosque and surprisingly modest security at kunming ’ s railway station , which was again crowded with travellers .

zh-CN: 在地处昆明市中心的顺城清真寺外，一块横幅标语敦促信徒加强民族关系和团结、建设和谐社会。
en-US: a banner outside the shuncheng mosque in kunming ’ s city centre urges worshippers to “ strengthen ethnic relations and unity , construct a harmonious society ” .

zh-CN: 虽然在维族和回族聚集的大树营附近停着大量警车，但街上几乎看不见警察。
en-US: while a large number of police vans were parked near dashuying , a mixed uighur and hui neighbourhood , officers were not visible on the streets .

zh-CN: “人们都很害怕，生意下滑了。”一名餐馆老板说，“上周日他们在这里抓了一些维族人。”
en-US: “ people are scared and business is down , ” one restaurant owner said . “ they rounded up some uighurs here on sunday . ”

zh-CN: 这些拘留无法得到证实。
en-US: the detentions could not be confirmed .

zh-CN: 但在其他地方，在中国全国人大和政协举行年会前夕，有迹象显示一场可能的反弹正在酝酿当中。
en-US: elsewhere , however , there were signs of a possible backlash brewing on the eve of the annual two-week session of china ’ s national parliament .

zh-CN: 上周三，一位知名维族学者以分裂罪被提起公诉。李方平是代表这位学者的人权律师，他在自己的博客上贴出了中国西南城市南宁警方的一份通知。通知要求当地居民报告到达该市的任何维族居民、商人或游客。
en-US: li fangping , a human rights lawyer representing a prominent uighur scholar charged on wednesday last week with separatist offences , posted on his blog a copy of a police notice from nanning , another city in china ’ s southwest , asking local residents to report the arrival of any uighur residents , businessmen or tourists in the area .

zh-CN: 南宁警方拒绝就此份通知置评。
en-US: nanning police declined to comment on the notice .

zh-CN: “这是对中央政府自上而下的维稳要求的一个反应。这是他们一贯的办事方式，”中国现代国际关系研究院的李伟表示。
en-US: “ this is a reaction to the central government ’ s top-down demand for stability. it ’ s their usual way of doing things , ” said mr li .

zh-CN: “这是一种非法和夸张的反应，不会解决危机，只会使事情变得更糟。”
en-US: “ it ’ s an illegal and exaggerated response that won ’ t solve the crisis and will just make things worse . ”

zh-CN: 你愿意上班被监控吗？
en-US: big brother can watch me at work any day

zh-CN: 上周英国《金融时报》报道了公司如何利用技术在工作中监控我们的可怕故事。
en-US: last week the financial times published a scary story about how technology is being used by companies to spy on us at work .

zh-CN: 它描述了公司如何不费力、不费钱，偷偷将传感器藏在胸牌或办公室家具里，来记录我们的位置、我们与谁交谈、乃至用何种语气交谈。
en-US: it described how sensors can be easily and cheaply hidden in name badges and office furniture to track where we are , who we talk to and in what tone of voice .

zh-CN: 人力资源部门可以知道我们休息多久后才开始工作，以及我们是如何工作的。
en-US: hr departments can find out how long we take to get to work and how we behave when we get there .

zh-CN: 在商店、呼叫中心甚至是董事会会议室，这些数据可能被用来决定提拔谁、解雇谁。
en-US: in shops , call centres and even boardrooms , the data could be used to decide who to promote and who to fire .

zh-CN: 当我读到这篇文章时感到不寒而栗，本报的许多读者也是如此。
en-US: i shuddered as i read the article – as did most ft readers .

zh-CN: 他们在网上评论说，“1984”(NineteenEighty-Four)来临了。
en-US: nineteen eighty-four is upon us , they commented online .

zh-CN: 极权主义泛滥！隐私被抛进了下水道！
en-US: totalitarianism is rampant ! privacy is down the plughole !

zh-CN: （其中一些发表在文章下面的“评论”中）。
en-US: ( some of the comments are published in “ feedback ” below ) .

zh-CN: 然而，进一步深入思索就会发现，“老大哥”(BigBrother)来到企业世界不一定有多么糟糕。
en-US: yet on closer inspection , the arrival of big brother in the corporate world is not necessarily such a bad thing .

zh-CN: 受到隐形装置无时不刻的监控听起来或许有些可怕，但我不敢肯定它会比主管偶尔现身的监控更可怕。
en-US: being constantly monitored by invisible devices might sound frightening but i ’m not sure it is any more so than being monitored infrequently by visible human beings .

zh-CN: 从当前的情况来看，我们的主管正以一种随意而不科学的方式观察着我们，他们很可能已经对我们有了定论，却根本不以多少证据为依据。
en-US: under the present arrangement , we are observed in a haphazard and unscientific way by superiors who may well have made up their minds about us already , based on not much evidence at all .

zh-CN: 按照“索德定律”，当你做好事时，没有人会注意到；但当你干坏事，就会被抓个现行。
en-US: sod ’ s law decrees that when you do something good , no one notices but the minute you do something bad you get caught .

zh-CN: 我记得有位老板很少会在办公室四处走动；但每次他悄无声息地出现在我的身后，我总是在列购物清单或者与我的妈妈通电话。
en-US: i remember one boss who , once in a blue moon , would walk around the office ; whenever he crept up behind me i was invariably writing a shopping list or was on the phone to my mum .

zh-CN: 这样的监控不会提高我的工作表现，却着实让我感觉冤枉。
en-US: such surveillance didn ’ t improve my behaviour , though it did increase my sense of injustice .

zh-CN: 而如果我是一直处于监控下，那么老板会在考虑我列购物清单的同时，考虑我在其它时间勤勉工作的表现，这样我就会大幅改进自己的表现。
en-US: to have been monitored all the time – which would have put the shopping list in the context of otherwise diligent behaviour – would have been a vast improvement .

zh-CN: 在大多数的办公室里，一大堆基本毫无意义而且繁琐的工具被用来评估员工的表现，包括“能力矩阵”、考核面谈和心理测试。
en-US: in most offices a raft of mainly pointless , cumbersome tools are used to assess performance , including “ competency matrices ” , appraisal interviews and psychometric testing .

zh-CN: 总的来说它们的效果很差，差到根据卡塔尼亚大学一份令人愉悦的研究报告，企业随意提拔员工，也不会比根据这些评估结果提拔员工糟糕。
en-US: together they are so ineffective that according to a delightful piece of research by the university of catania , companies would be no worse off promoting people at random .

zh-CN: 如果我们支持唯才是举，那么也就应该支持有助于更准确衡量工作表现的任何举措。
en-US: if we are in favour of meritocracies , we should also be in favour of anything that helps us measure merit more accurately .

zh-CN: 尽管几乎可以肯定，传感器收集的数据过于粗糙而帮助不大，但我看不出有什么原因能阻止我们在未来某一天（很可能相当快），搞清楚哪一种行为上的怪癖是导致员工表现优秀或糟糕的关键因素，并找出一种得体而客观地衡量员工表现的方式。
en-US: while the data collected by the new sensors are almost certainly too crude to offer much help now , i see no reason why in time ( and probably quite soon ) we will not have worked out exactly which behavioural quirks are the key to high ( or low ) performance , and found a decent , objective way of measuring them .

zh-CN: 引起英国《金融时报》读者极度反感的一些传感器是Steelcase制造的。该公司希望，总有一天这些传感器不仅用来监控初级员工，而且还会被用在董事会会议室。
en-US: steelcase , which makes some of the sensors so loathed by ft readers , hopes that one day they will not only be used to monitor juniors but in boardrooms too .

zh-CN: 尽管很难想象董事们会愿意将这些工具用于监控自己，但如果他们真的愿意的话，那这个想法棒极了。
en-US: while it is hard to see directors willingly turning these tools upon themselves , it would be a terrific idea if they did .

zh-CN: 就目前而言，根本做不到监控董事们在董事会会议室内的行为——外部人士偶尔会评论几句，但这种事情在政治上极度敏感，他们几乎不可能带来什么改变。
en-US: at the moment , monitoring of boardroom behaviour is hopeless – outsiders periodically come in to observe , but such are the political sensitivities it is almost impossible for them to make a difference .

zh-CN: 话说回来，如果所有董事都受到监控，任何喋喋不休地说个不停、让会议室里的其他董事昏昏欲睡的人，都会被监控忠实地揭发出来。
en-US: if , by contrast , all directors were wired up , anyone who banged on indefinitely , lowering the pulses of their boardroom colleagues , would be faithfully fingered by the technology .

zh-CN: 同样，说出一个新奇观点、让所有人一下子来了精神的那个人，也会被记录下来。
en-US: equally , the person who made the odd remark that made everyone sit up in their seats would also be marked out .

zh-CN: 当董事们知道有监控设备在，也知道这种做法的目的是让他们提出入木三分、值得争论的观点，董事会会议的质量将得到极大改善。
en-US: knowing that the devices were there , and knowing the object of the exercise was to make incisive , controversial points , would improve board meetings no end .

zh-CN: 有人反对说，办公室的监控行为将会扼杀信任和主动性，让我们所有人都变成机器人。
en-US: it is objected that monitoring behaviour in offices would kill trust and spontaneity , making robots of us all .

zh-CN: 但只要所有人都知道他们正受到监控，而且也明白监控的目的，我认为人们就不应如此害怕监控——或许除了那些欺凌、叱喝和骚扰其他同事的人，以及一直在躲避监控的人以外。
en-US: but so long as everyone knew they were being monitored and understood what for , i don ’ t see why it should be such a terrifying idea – except perhaps for those who bully , shout at and harass others – and who have been getting away with it .

zh-CN: “老大哥”的来临可能会促进、而非降低人们在工作中的文明程度。
en-US: far from making work less civilised , the arrival of big brother could make it more so .

zh-CN: 办公室生活可能变得更加透明而且减少了争权夺利。
en-US: office life could become more transparent and less political .

zh-CN: 经理们将不用全天扮演警察的角色，从而可以发挥帮助人们提高工作效率的更重要的作用。
en-US: and managers would be freed from having to play the role of policeman all day and allowed to get on with the more important role of helping people do a better job .

zh-CN: 一些问题需要得到解决。
en-US: some problems would need resolving .

zh-CN: 首先大规模监控可能是非法的。
en-US: for a start extensive monitoring could be illegal .

zh-CN: 你还必须确保员工不能破坏监控过程，以及品格低下的经理不会为了自己不可告人的目的而忙着操纵数据。
en-US: you would also have to ensure that workers were not able to subvert the process – and that wicked managers were not busily manipulating the data for their own devious ends .

zh-CN: 最重要的是，要想让监控系统奏效，你就需要对实施它的整套管理制度有一些信心。
en-US: above all , for the system to work , you would need to have some faith in the regime that implemented it .

zh-CN: 但如果你对管理制度没有丝毫信心，不管怎样你都可能搞砸。
en-US: but then , if you don ’ t have any faith in the regime , the chances are that you are screwed anyway .

zh-CN: 新增钢铁产能挑战中国治污计划
en-US: new steel plants cast doubt on china ’ s emission control plan

zh-CN: 关停钢厂是中国政府减少污染计划的核心环节，但其关门的步伐可能赶不上钢铁产能扩张的步伐，这令人质疑中国政府抗击华北地区空气污染的行动能否取得进展。
en-US: steel plant closures central to the chinese government ’ s plan for cutting pollution are likely to be outpaced by steel mills under construction , casting doubt on beijing ’ s ability to make headway against air pollution enveloping northern china .

zh-CN: 周三，北京再一次被浓浓的雾霾笼罩，这场雾霾覆盖华北地区的时间已超过一个礼拜。
en-US: on wednesday , beijing was again gripped by the thick grey pall that has lingered over northern china for more than a week .

zh-CN: 民众对空气污染的愤怒，促使政府加快了发布空气质量监测数据的频率，并可能促使环境监管机构关停有势力排污企业的力度增强。
en-US: public anger over air pollution has spurred the government to speed up the release of air monitoring data , and could strengthen the hand of environmental regulators in shutting down powerful polluters .

zh-CN: 目前中国全国范围内在建的钢铁产能约3000万吨，比河北省2014年承诺削减的1500万吨产能多一倍。河北省是环绕北京的工业大省，钢产能占全中国的四分之一左右。
en-US: about 30 m tonnes of new steel capacity across the country is still under construction , double the 15 m tonnes of cuts pledged for 2014 by hebei province , the industrial heartland surrounding beijing which accounts for about a quarter of chinese steel capacity .

zh-CN: 华北平原的污染情况一直比全国标准严重。为服从一项旨在减少华北平原污染物排放的全国计划，河北省同意削减钢产能。
en-US: hebei agreed to the cuts as part of a national plan to reduce polluting emissions in the north china plain , where pollution regularly exceeds national standards .

zh-CN: 官方媒体播放了拆除钢厂和水泥厂的画面，以凸显政府的决心。
en-US: state media showed footage of steel mills and cement plants being destroyed to underline the government ’ s resolve .

zh-CN: 自计划宣布以来，河北已永久关停约800万吨钢铁产能。
en-US: about 8m tonnes of capacity have been permanently closed down in hebei since the plan was announced .

zh-CN: 但迄今为止，被关停的只不过是那些实力最弱的排污企业。
en-US: but so far , it is the least powerful polluters that have taken it on the chin .

zh-CN: 在英国《金属导报》于北京举办的一次铁矿石行业会议上，中国规模最大的钢铁制造商之一——河北钢铁集团营销管理处处长王继光说：“总体来说，到目前为止关停的都只是些陈旧落后、不赚钱的钢厂。”
en-US: “ generally speaking , the mills that have closed are older and unprofitable , ” wang jiguang , a sales director at hebei iron and steel group , one of china ’ s largest steel producers , said at an iron ore conference organised by metal bulletin in beijing .

zh-CN: 其中大多数其实已经因为经济原因停产了6个月到1年。
en-US: most of them have actually been idle for six months to a year already due to economic reasons .

zh-CN: 河北省承诺在2017年底前削减6000万吨钢铁产能，这是一项经过协商的方案的一部分，根据该方案，中国将减少华北、长三角和珠三角的污染物排放，同时鼓励企业在贫瘠的西部投资发展工业。
en-US: hebei pledged to cut its steel capacity by 60 m tonnes by 2017 , as part of a negotiated deal to reduce emissions in northern china , the yangtze delta and the pearl river delta while encouraging industrial investment in the arid west .

zh-CN: 与此同时，考虑到污染排放企业对当地就业和税收的贡献，中央政府设立了一项16亿美元的专项资金，用于奖励污染减排达标的企业。
en-US: meanwhile , the central government set up a $1.6bn fund to reward industry that complies with emission cuts , in recognition of the local jobs and taxes generated by polluting companies .

zh-CN: 专项资金预计将拨给河北省约3.3亿美元。北京的电力主要由该省供应。
en-US: it is expected to transfer about $330 m to hebei province , which is also the source of most of beijing ’ s power supply .

zh-CN: 中央规划部门以往试图通过行政指令削减工业产能的举措同样以失败告终，因为工厂老板和为工厂提供贷款的银行几乎总是会选择扩张产能，而不是坐等被关闭。
en-US: past attempts by central planning agencies to reduce industrial capacity by fiat have similarly ended in tears , as plant bosses and the banks that lend to them almost always chose to expand rather than face closure .

zh-CN: 事实证明，在中国，让市场来淘汰缺乏效率的生产商更加困难，因为国有钢铁企业通常业绩最差。
en-US: allowing the market to cull the inefficient producers has proved even more difficult in china , as state-owned steel companies are generally the worst performers .

zh-CN: 除了投资生产汽车用钢的钢厂以外，据北京梅塔科咨询公司总裁许中波表示，内地产能在500万吨以上的钢铁制造商——也就是中国规模最大、最有政治势力的十数家钢铁企业——几乎全都在亏损。
en-US: nearly every inland steel producer with more than 5m tonnes of capacity – in other words , at least a dozen of china ’ s biggest and most politically powerful mills – are losing money , according to industry expert xu zhongbo of beijing metal consulting ltd , with the exception of mills that have invested in automotive steel .

zh-CN: 把政策目标直接放在减少污染、而不是削减工业产能，效果通常更好。
en-US: policies directly tied to reducing pollution rather than cutting industrial capacity have generally been more effective .

zh-CN: 例如，中国约10年前下令电解铝行业淘汰污染严重的自焙槽技术，铝厂都改造了设备。
en-US: for instance , about a decade ago china ordered the phase-out of the heavily polluting soderberg process at aluminium smelters , and smelters were duly upgraded .

zh-CN: 近年来，中国各地发电厂都在安装涤气器，而且随着政府修改发电补贴规则、奖励使用涤气装置的做法，电厂也就更有意愿安装这类装置。
en-US: power plants across china have installed emissions scrubbers , and have become more willing to use them in recent years after power subsidies were tweaked to reward their operation .

zh-CN: 中国移动手机快速增长
en-US: china ’ s mobile sector grows up superfast

zh-CN: 走在上海喧闹的商业街上，路人常常会被手持智能手机、步履匆匆的上班族撞到肩膀。这个国度已经须臾离不开移动设备，上海的街道就是一个缩影。
en-US: the bustling shopping streets of shanghai drive home the image of a country glued to mobile devices , often at the expense of passers-by shouldered out of the way by workers hurrying past with smartphone in hand .

zh-CN: 对于正在召开的世界移动通信大会，中国电信市场的心情和7.5万名与会者的心情一样急切。这些与会者们上周来到熙熙攘攘的巴塞罗那，参加这个全球电信业最大的年度展会。
en-US: the chinese telecoms market was equally as urgent for the 75,000 people who descended on a bustling barcelona last week for the industry’s biggest annual conference .

zh-CN: 欧洲和美国享受超高速的4G服务已有好几年时间了，而世界最大的移动运营商中国移动(ChinaMobile)的近10亿用户，直到最近才刚刚迎来所谓4G或LTE技术。
en-US: while europeans and americans have had superfast 4g services for several years , the close to a billion people signed up to china mobile , the world ’ s largest mobile carrier , are only now being given their first sight of so-called 4g or lte technology .

zh-CN: 不过，在国家政策的推动下，中国建成的4G移动基站的数量已超过整个欧洲。中国电信业发展的规模和速度由此可见一斑。
en-US: but such is the scale and speed at which china ’ s telecoms industry moves , driven by state policy , that there are already more 4g mobile masts installed in china than in the whole of europe .

zh-CN: 未来几个月，中国预计将面对主要设备制造商展开新一轮大规模招标，这将拉大中欧之间的差距。
en-US: this gap will widen with a further wave of large tenders expected by the leading equipment makers in the next few months .

zh-CN: 4G技术给这个人口最多的国家带来的不仅是更快的网速。
en-US: china ’ s adoption of 4g is not just a story about bringing faster internet speeds to the most populous nation .

zh-CN: 中国移动及其竞争对手使用的4G技术类型——称为TD-LTE标准——将对苹果(Apple)、三星(Samsung)等手机制造商和爱立信(Ericsson)、诺基亚(Nokia)等电信设备厂商产生广泛影响。
en-US: the type of 4g technology – a standard called td-lte – used by china mobile and its rivals means there are wide-ranging ramifications for device makers such as apple and samsung and telecoms equipment makers such as ericsson and nokia .

zh-CN: 更不用提华为(Huawei)等得益于中国电信业繁荣发展的本土科技领军企业了。
en-US: not to mention homegrown technology champions such as huawei , which is benefiting more than most from the country’s telecoms boom .

zh-CN: 咨询公司AnalysysMason亚太团队首席分析师汤姆•莫厄特说：“电信业是中国经济繁荣的有力例证。基于‘中国设计’的一个全球标准，是很有影响力的，也会给中国电信商带来了经济利益。”
en-US: “ the telecoms industry has been the poster child of the chinese economic boom. a global standard based on a chinese design is a prestige thing , and also an economic boon to the chinese telecoms vendors , ” says tom mowat , lead analyst for analysys mason ’ s asia - pacific team .

zh-CN: 不断加速
en-US: need for speed

zh-CN: 4G技术可在移动电话上实现近乎实时的网络传输，为一大批服务和应用铺平了道路，也为苹果等西方科技企业打开了广阔的市场。随着中国使用4G技术，苹果最终得以向中国移动的7.5亿用户出售iPhone。
en-US: 4g technology is capable of delivering the internet over mobile phones almost instantly , opening up a host of services and applications as well as a vast market for western technology groups such as apple , which will finally be able to sell its iphones to china mobile ’ s 750 m customers .

zh-CN: 莫厄特说：“我们估计，到2016年，全球每10部手机中，就会有一部使用中国移动的网络。”
en-US: “ by 2016 , we estimate that china mobile will be used for one in ten handsets globally , ” says mr mowat .

zh-CN: 对超高速网络技术的迅速采纳，凸显了中国经济和社会的发展。
en-US: the rapid adoption of superfast internet technology underscores the country’s economic and social development .

zh-CN: 尽管中国企业曾被视为西方企业的廉价模仿者，但引入超高速网络意味着，以网络为导向的新公司——例如微信(WeChat)和阿里巴巴(Alibaba)——已经与硅谷的竞争对手们展开较量了。
en-US: while chinese companies were previously seen as cheap imitators of western groups , the introduction of superfast networks has meant new web-orientated businesses such as wechat and alibaba are already competing with silicon valley rivals .

zh-CN: 中国试图以自身标准引领全球电信业发展，这不是第一回。
en-US: this is not the first time china has sought to take a lead with its telecoms networks .

zh-CN: 10年来，在中国3G市场上，GSM和CDMA两种标准间的市场争夺战从未停止过。
en-US: the battle for the 3g market has been fought with unblinking perseverance between gsm and cdma standards over the past decade .

zh-CN: 支持TD-SCDMA标准的中国移动败下阵来。大多数国际网络现在采纳GSM标准。
en-US: china mobile , which favoured the td-cdma standard , lost. most global networks now conform to gsm .

zh-CN: 这就是中国移动为何这么多年来都不支持iPhone的原因。难怪北京奥运会的访客们抱怨，这样一场重大活动的移动服务太差劲了。
en-US: this is why there was no iphone on china mobile ’ s network for so many years and why visitors to the beijing olympics complained about the poor mobile service at such an important event .

zh-CN: 中国本土咨询公司博达克(BDA)的董事长邓肯•克拉克说：“中国政府强迫中国移动使用本土设计的TD标准，但中国移动没能真正将这项标准发展起来。”
en-US: “ the government had to force it down the throat of china mobile and even then the company could not really make it work , ” says duncan clark , chairman of bda , an inward investment group .

zh-CN: 就4G而言，中国的TD标准不必与更通行的FDD-LTE技术竞争，因为二者可以兼容于4G手机。
en-US: with 4g , china ’ s td standard is not necessarily a competing technology to the more common fdd-lte technology , since both can coexist in handsets .

zh-CN: 设备制造商不必被迫在相互竞争的技术中做出选择，这给TD标准带来了更大的成功机会。
en-US: equipment makers will not be forced to choose between competing technologies – and as such will give the td standards a far higher chance of success .

zh-CN: 中国的市场如今也更为成熟，此次新技术的推广规模如此巨大，涵盖了国内全部三家电信运营商，意味着TD技术登上全球电信市场中心舞台的机会大大提高了。
en-US: the chinese market is also more mature now , and the sheer scale of the rollout this time involving all three of the country’s telecoms groups means there is a much higher chance of putting the td technology at the heart of the global telecoms market .

zh-CN: 标准争夺战
en-US: standards battle

zh-CN: 中国4G项目的规模之大，能给其采纳的TD标准带来蓬勃生机，也为中国创造了引领全球下一代宽带技术发展的契机。
en-US: the scale of the 4g programme gives the adopted standard momentum – and china the opportunity to take the lead in the next generation of global broadband technology .

zh-CN: 分析人士表示，未来技术标准之争正愈演愈烈，中国正通过国内的广泛推广来扶持它自己开发的相对冷门的技术标准。
en-US: in a growing battle over future technology standards , analysts say china is sponsoring the less popular form of technology through widespread domestic take-up .

zh-CN: 目前，全世界只有大约17个TD-LTE类型的商用移动网络，而TD-LTE连接数只占全球LTE连接总数的2.5%。
en-US: there are only about 17 td-lte mobile networks commercially available worldwide – or one in 40 lte connections globally .

zh-CN: 莫厄特表示：“运营这类网络的全世界最大运营商，会立刻把（TD-LTE）变成极为成功的全球标准。”
en-US: “ the world ’ s largest operator running this sort of network immediately turns [ td-lte ] into a very successful global standard , ” says mr mowat .

zh-CN: 利益分配
en-US: division of the spoils

zh-CN: 颇为讽刺的是，在中国展示其建设超高速移动宽带的宏大抱负的同时，中国“长城防火墙(GreatFirewall)”对外国网站的封禁和过滤，却可能会把中国互联网网速降到难以置信的低水平。
en-US: there are some ironies in china ’ s bold ambitions for the introduction of superfast mobile broadband , given the internet can be incredibly slow because of the “ great firewall ” that blocks or filters foreign sites .

zh-CN: 不过，衡量4G在中国的推广速度，要考虑一个大背景，那就是电信行业在很大程度上由中国政府把控。
en-US: but the speed of the rollout needs to be seen in the context of a telecoms industry largely controlled by the state .

zh-CN: 汇丰银行(HSBC)亚洲分行电信方面的区域主管塔克•格里南(TuckerGrinnan)表示：“中国移动的资产负债表规模达650亿美元，它有足够财力开展极为迅速的扩建工程。中国政府将该公司的资产规模视为一个有用工具。”
en-US: “ china mobile has $65 bn on its balance sheet so it can afford to build out very quickly. the government sees its balance sheet as a useful tool , ” says tucker grinnan , regional head of telecoms for hsbc in asia .

zh-CN: 4G网络的建设大部分由华为(Huawei)和中兴(ZTE)等中国集团承担，不过它们都否认与政府有直接关系。
en-US: much of the work to build the 4g network has been won by chinese groups such as huawei and zte , which deny direct links to the state .

zh-CN: 爱立信、诺基亚西门子通信(NSN)和阿尔卡特-朗讯(Alcatel-Lucent)等西方公司也赢得了规模相当大的合同。不过，中国移动4G合同总规模为200亿元人民币(合32.5亿美元），以上三家公司都只分到了11%的份额，而中国移动表现得十分专断。为此，这三家公司的部分高管已表达了不满。
en-US: western groups such as ericsson , nsn and alcatel-lucent have won sizeable contracts , but some of their executives have expressed dissatisfaction about china mobile awarding all three western manufacturers a seemingly arbitrary 11 per cent each of its rmb20bn ( $ 3.25 bn ) 4g contract .

zh-CN: 4G之后
en-US: beyond 4g

zh-CN: 在争夺行业领导地位的比赛中，中国技术企业没有止步于4G，华为已把大量资源投资于下一代的所谓“5G”技术。
en-US: chinese technology groups are not stopping at 4g in the race for industry leadership , with huawei committing significant resources to the next generation of so-called “5g ” technology .

zh-CN: 总部位于英国的研究集团CCSInsight预计，今后两年，中国将成为下一代移动技术的领头羊，将欧洲甩在后面。在欧洲，当局正推动电信业加大投资“以恢复昔日荣光”，但这一举措可谓姗姗来迟。
en-US: ccs insight , a uk-based research group , predicts china will become the leader in next-generation mobile technology in the next two years , leaving behind a europe where authorities are belatedly pushing the industry to invest “ to regain former glory ” .

zh-CN: 华为表示，到2018年，该公司将在5G技术研发上至少投资6亿美元。5G技术的通信速度将超过4G技术100倍。
en-US: huawei said that by 2018 it would invest at least $600 m in research into 5 g technology capable of speeds more than 100 times faster than 4g .

zh-CN: 这一投资规模远远超过了任何西方竞争对手声称将要投资的金额。
en-US: that investment is far more than has been claimed by any western rival .

zh-CN: 事实上，寻求在下一代技术中占据领先地位，已成为一种维护区域利益的争夺战。
en-US: indeed , this has now become a battle of regional interests to seek an edge in next-generation technology .

zh-CN: 中国正大刀阔斧地建设超高速移动互联网，推动这一进程的中国政府希望借此打开一个首先惠及本国科技领军企业的市场。
en-US: the march towards superfast mobile internet in china has been speeded by government efforts and the desire to create a market to benefit its technology champions .

zh-CN: 中国消费者将享受到世界级的网络质量，这将令该国原本已迅速成长的互联网企业受益。不过，审查部门可能会继续密切监视互联网上传播的内容。
en-US: china consumers will enjoy world-class network quality , with resulting benefits to the internet groups already growing rapidly in the country , though censors will probably continue keeping a close tab on content .

zh-CN: 美国目前正就跨大西洋和太平洋的主要贸易协议展开谈判。
en-US: the us is currently negotiating major trade agreements across the atlantic and pacific .

zh-CN: 这两项协议从规模上看都是具有历史意义的，它为美国提供了一个塑造全球经济的机会，从中加强美国在全球的领导力，并壮大美国本国的中产阶级群体。
en-US: both deals are historic in scope , offering us a chance to shape the global economy in ways that strengthen us leadership in the world and the american middle class at home .

zh-CN: 美国国会以及我所在民主党的很多人，对这些新的贸易协议持怀疑态度，不愿为其提供支持。
en-US: many in congress and in my own party view new trade agreements sceptically and are reluctant to offer their support .

zh-CN: 我对这些立法者所面临的压力表示理解。
en-US: i understand the pressures these lawmakers face .

zh-CN: 但我确信，我们正在磋商的这两项协议符合美国最佳利益，政治人士将最终因为协议的成功签订而获得褒奖。
en-US: but i am convinced that the two deals we are negotiating are in america ’ s best interest , and that politicians will ultimately be rewarded for making them happen .

zh-CN: 这就是为什么总统巴拉克•奥巴马和我致力于缔结协议的原因。
en-US: that is why president barack obama and i are committed to seeing them through .

zh-CN: 全球经济正处于一个拐点。
en-US: the global economy is at an inflection point .

zh-CN: 美国现在做出的选择，将决定未来几十年美国在全球的角色。
en-US: the choices we make now will determine our role in the world for decades to come .

zh-CN: 我们拥有了一个影响全球商业发展的机会，以传播我们的价值观并造福于我们的人民，我们应抓住这个机会。
en-US: we have an opportunity to shape the path of global commerce to spread our values and benefit our people , and we should seize it .

zh-CN: 多年来，美国一直是全球首屈一指的经济强国，在可预见的未来仍将如此。
en-US: the us has been the world ’ s pre-eminent economic power for many years and will remain so for the foreseeable future .

zh-CN: 但新的经济强国的崛起意味着，美国将面临来自比以往任何时候都更多的地区激烈竞争。
en-US: but the rise of new economic powers means we will face fierce competition from more places than ever before .

zh-CN: 美国与全球其它地区的经济关系，现在比以往任何时候都更为重要。
en-US: america ’ s economic relations with the rest of the world matter more now than ever before .

zh-CN: 那些匆匆设置保护主义壁垒，并扭曲本国经济、偏袒国有企业的国家，正在挑战我们几十年来一直依赖的规则。
en-US: countries that throw up protectionist barriers and distort their economies to favour state-owned enterprises are challenging rules of the road that we have relied on for decades .

zh-CN: 问题是，美国是将发挥领导作用、发展一条反映美国价值观的新道路，还是我们将在新秩序形成之际袖手旁观。
en-US: the question is whether the us will take a leadership role in shaping a new course that reflects american values – or whether we will stand on the sidelines as a new order unfolds .

zh-CN: 目前正在磋商的这两项协议将令美国处于两个巨大贸易区的核心。
en-US: the two agreements now in the works would place the us at the centre of two vast trading regions .

zh-CN: 《跨太平洋战略经济伙伴关系协定》将把美国与日本、马来西亚和智利等不同经济体连接在一起。
en-US: the trans-pacific partnership would connect america to economies as diverse as japan , malaysia and chile .

zh-CN: 《跨大西洋贸易和投资伙伴关系协定》将大大加深我们与欧盟(EU)已构建的数万亿美元的经济关系。
en-US: the transatlantic trade and investment partnership would significantly deepen what is already a multitrillion-dollar economic relationship with the eu .

zh-CN: 这两项协议将把全球经济的近三分之二联合在一起，支持公开和公平的经济竞争。
en-US: together they would unite nearly two-thirds of the world economy in support of open and fair economic competition .

zh-CN: 这两项协议都将扩大美国出口，并帮助将优质的中产阶级工作岗位吸引到美国来。
en-US: both of the deals will increase us exports and help attract good middle-class jobs to america .

zh-CN: 全球95%的消费者生活在我们的国界以外，因此出口至关重要。
en-US: when 95 per cent of the world ’ s customers live beyond our borders , exports are critical .

zh-CN: 外部研究发现，TPP和TTIP将各令美国出口每年增加逾1200亿美元。
en-US: outside studies have found that the tpp and ttip would each increase exports by more than $120 bn a year .

zh-CN: 约4400万美国人为出口商品的企业工作。
en-US: some 44m americans work for companies that export goods .

zh-CN: 以出口为支撑的工作的薪资，比全国平均水平最多高出18%。
en-US: jobs supported by exports pay as much as 18 per cent higher than the national average .

zh-CN: 几十年来，我们的经济尽管实现了增长，但中产阶级却遭受打击，因此，美国人现在对国内不平等程度日益加深感到担忧是可以理解的。
en-US: after decades when our economy grew but the middle class took a beating , americans are understandably worried about rising inequality at home .

zh-CN: 总统和我决心解决这个问题。
en-US: the president and i are determined to address this .

zh-CN: 因此，我们正在磋商的这些协议与我们国家此前签订的协议有所不同，这反映出20年全球化所带来的教训。
en-US: so the deals we are negotiating are different from those our country has signed before , reflecting the lessons of two decades of globalisation .

zh-CN: 其中包括采取空前举措保护劳动力标准、环境和知识产权，同时做出新的承诺、反对偏袒国有企业的行为。
en-US: they include unprecedented steps to protect labour standards , the environment and intellectual property , as well as new commitments against favouritism for state-owned enterprises .

zh-CN: 这些举措要求那些可能试图通过低价与我们竞争的国家，达到我们的高标准。
en-US: they require nations that might otherwise try to undercut us to match our high standards instead .

zh-CN: 我们的出口仍面临着很多国家设置的壁垒。
en-US: our exports still face barriers in many countries .

zh-CN: 这些协议必须建立一个公平的竞争环境。
en-US: these agreements must level the playing field .

zh-CN: 美国仅占日本汽车市场不到1%的份额。
en-US: america has less than a 1 per cent share of japan ’ s automobile market .

zh-CN: 正如我直接对日本领导人说过的那样，如果我们希望向前走，就必须消除阻碍美国汽车出口的壁垒。
en-US: as i have said directly to japan ’ s leaders , we must address barriers to american car exports if we hope to move forward .

zh-CN: 然而，这些好处不仅仅是经济上的。
en-US: but the benefits are not just economic .

zh-CN: 在美国重申其作为太平洋强国的地位之际，该地区很多人在问，我们是否会继续留在那里。
en-US: as america reasserts its role as a pacific power , many in the region are asking whether we are there to stay .

zh-CN: 部署兵力和外交人员至关重要。
en-US: deploying soldiers and diplomats is essential .

zh-CN: 但在其他国家利用经济力量争夺影响力、甚至逼迫较小邻国之际，美国除了展开强大的经济攻势，别无选择——既要代表我们自己的企业，也要保护商业开放和公平竞争。
en-US: but as other nations use their economic might to compete for influence and even coerce smaller neighbours , there is no substitute for robust american economic engagement – on behalf of our own companies and in defence of open commerce and fair competition .

zh-CN: TPP已成为表明美国实力不减的标志。
en-US: the tpp has become a symbol of american staying power .

zh-CN: 我们必须坚持到底。
en-US: we must see it through .

zh-CN: 我们的欧洲盟友早已是我们首要的安全合作伙伴，从利比亚到阿富汗。
en-US: our european allies are already our security partners of first resort , from libya to afghanistan .

zh-CN: TTIP将提振增长，帮助欧美继续推进现代化，并投入历史上最强大的合作。
en-US: ttip will spur growth that helps both sides of the atlantic continue to modernise and invest in the most powerful alliance in history .

zh-CN: 当总统获得来自国会的支持和建议时，这将增强美国在谈判桌上的地位。
en-US: when a president receives support and guidance from congress , that strengthens america ’ s hand at the negotiating table .

zh-CN: 这就是为何总统和我一直要求国会授权我们去促进贸易的原因。
en-US: that is why the president and i have asked congress to grant us trade promotion authority .

zh-CN: 这意味着，国会要具体规划美国的目标，并为密切磋商设定条款。
en-US: this means that congress outlines us objectives in detail and sets the terms for close consultation .

zh-CN: 当由此产生的协议只需要一次简单的投票时，国会将拥有最后的决定权。
en-US: congress gets the final say when it puts the resulting agreements to a simple vote .

zh-CN: 我意识到，贸易可能会是一个有争议的问题。
en-US: i realise trade can be a contentious issue .

zh-CN: 我自己曾参加过几次竞选，尽力做到绝不在政治上对其他人指手画脚。
en-US: having run for office a few times myself , i do my best never to tell another man or woman his or her politics .

zh-CN: 但我还相信，好政策将带来好政治。
en-US: but i also believe that good policy makes good politics .

zh-CN: 能让美国中产阶级变强的贸易，既是好政策，也是好政治。
en-US: and trade that strengthens america ’ s middle class is both .

zh-CN: 朝鲜再次发射两枚短程导弹
en-US: north korea fires short range missiles

zh-CN: 朝鲜发射了两枚短程导弹，再次明确表示出对上周开始的美韩联合军演的不满。
en-US: north korea has fired two short range missiles in a second apparent show of displeasure with us-south korean joint exercises that began last week .

zh-CN: 韩国国防部表示，两枚导弹周一早晨6时19分自边防城市元山附近射出。
en-US: the south korean defence ministry said two missiles were fired from near the post city of wonsan at 6.19 am on monday .

zh-CN: 导弹飞行500多公里后落入海洋，但似乎并不是针对韩国船只。
en-US: they travelled more than 500 kilometres into the ocean , but did not appear to be targeting south korean vessels .

zh-CN: 上周五，朝鲜采取类似的行动，发射了四枚短程导弹。
en-US: this comes after north korea performed a similar exercise on friday , firing four short-range missiles .

zh-CN: 韩国国防部还表示，韩国正在监控局势，但并未宣布进入特别警戒状态。
en-US: the defence ministry also said south korea was monitoring the situation , with no special alert footing declared .

zh-CN: 朝鲜通常会强烈抗议美韩军队一年一度的大型联合军事演习，认为这是在为侵略做准备。
en-US: north korea typically protests strongly against the annual major exercises by us and south korean troops , which it labels preparation for an invasion .

zh-CN: 上月初，朝鲜驻伦敦大使曾警告称，联合军演可能将朝鲜半岛“拖到战争边缘”。这与去年引起全球媒体注意的好战言论遥相呼应。
en-US: its ambassador to london warned early last month that the joint exercises may bring the peninsula " to the brink of war " , echoing bellicose rhetoric that grabbed global media attention last year .

zh-CN: 但平壤方面在过去两个月内接连发表声明，强调有意与韩国改善关系。上月，它举行了2010年以来的首次朝韩离散亲人团聚。
en-US: however , pyongyang has made a series of statements over the past two months stressing its desire to improve relations with seoul , and last month it hosted the first reunions of families divided by the inter-korean border since 2010 .

zh-CN: 韩国国防部表示，联合军演将按计划继续进行。
en-US: the south korean ministry of defence said the joint exercises will continue as planned .

zh-CN: 中国互联网金融：小即是美
en-US: for chinese internet finance , small is beautiful

zh-CN: 在中国，互联网金融成了一个引起城乡居民广泛关注的词语。
en-US: internet finance is a term drawing massive attention from cities to villages across china .

zh-CN: 从广义上看，互联网金融——包含个人对个人贷款（简称P2P贷款）和众筹在内——是指任何通过因特网或其他IP网络向公众提供金融服务的机构。
en-US: by broad definition , internet finance – which includes peer-to-peer ( p2p ) lending and crowd funding – includes any organisation that extends their financial applications to the public over internet or any other ip network .

zh-CN: 在中国，围绕着传统银行是否会被互联网金融所颠覆的争论甚嚣尘上。反观其他许多国家，互联网金融与传统银行业一道经历了一场革命。
en-US: heated discussion surrounds the question of whether internet finance may replace conventional banking in china , unlike in many countries where it has undergone an evolution alongside conventional banking .

zh-CN: 要看到这场竞争的未来，先得理解传统银行与互联网金融两者间的本质差异。
en-US: to see the future of this competition , we first need to understand the fundamental differences between them .

zh-CN: 我们先集中研究一下互联网金融的一个类别——互联网贷款。互联网贷款有两种流行的模式。
en-US: here let us focus on a particular class of internet finance as an example – online lending – which includes two popular models .

zh-CN: 一种是以电商为基础，向注册客户提供的贷款，中国的代表有阿里金融(Alifinance)，美国的代表有亚马逊(Amazon)。
en-US: one is based on e-commerce , in which loans are provided to registered customers such as with ali finance in china and amazon in the us .

zh-CN: 另一种是P2P平台贷款，在中国有陆金所(Lufax)、拍拍贷(PPDai)，欧美有Kabbage、LendingClub、ProsperMarketplace。
en-US: the other model is p2p lending , such lufax and pp dai in china , and kabbage , lending club , prosper marketplace in the us and european countries .

zh-CN: 不难看出，无论是在中国还是其他国家，互联网贷款机构的一个共同点就是以小客户为主。
en-US: almost all online lending organisations in china and overseas target small clients .

zh-CN: 例如，阿里金融的贷款额度为8000美元至16万美元，陆金所的最低投资额约为1500美元。
en-US: the lending quotas of ali finance , for example , range from $8,000 to $160,000 and the minimum investment in lufax is around $1,500 .

zh-CN: 作为美国两家最大的P2P贷款平台，LendingClub和ProsperMarketplace的平均贷款额分别约为1.2万美元和7000美元。
en-US: the average loan amount of lending club and prosper marketplace , the two largest p2p platforms in us , is around $12,000 and $7,000 respectively .

zh-CN: 与互联网金融构成鲜明对比的是，大量的传统银行都乐于服务大客户，不喜欢中小企业。
en-US: in contrast to internet finance , a lot of conventional banks prefer large customers rather than small and medium enterprises ( smes ) .

zh-CN: 例如，中国民生银行(ChinaMinshengBank)以做小微客户闻名，已向约100万家小微企业发放贷款，但即使这样，其对每家客户的平均贷款额也约为25万美元，大大高于互联网贷款平台的贷款额。
en-US: the china minsheng bank , for instance , is famous for its smaller scale client business in china which has seen it lend to about 1m enterprises , but even here the average loan amount has been approximately $250,000 – significantly higher than that of online lending platforms .

zh-CN: 这种天壤之别的主要原因在于，传统银行与互联网金融企业的风险管理做法不同。
en-US: the main reason for this dichotomy lies in the different risk management operations of conventional banks and internet finance companies .

zh-CN: 传统银行非常依赖抵押、担保和线下收集信息，而互联网贷款平台通常不要求此类抵押或担保，而仅靠线上信息源。
en-US: conventional banks rely heavily on collateral , guarantees and offline information collection , while online platforms usually require no such collateral or guarantees while relying on online information sources .

zh-CN: 传统银行在线下收集信息和抵押品管理方面，需要投入大量的时间和金钱；这意味着，此类工作的边际成本会随着贷款规模的增加而递减。
en-US: the offline information collection and collateral management functions of conventional banks are consuming of time and money ; meaning that the marginal cost of such work diminishes as the size of the loan increases .

zh-CN: 也就难怪银行愿意基于抵押品发放大额贷款。
en-US: no wonder therefore that banks prefer granting big loans based on collateral .

zh-CN: 相比之下，互联网贷款通常不要求借款者提供抵押或担保。
en-US: by contrast , online lending usually doesn’t require borrowers to provide collateral or guarantees .

zh-CN: 但互联网供应链借贷的不同之处在于，可以从电商平台上获取实时交易信息。
en-US: but what makes online supply chain lending different is that they can obtain real-time transaction information through e-commerce platforms .

zh-CN: 有了充足的信息输入，贷款平台可以放心地用统计模型来评估借款者的信誉可靠度。
en-US: with sufficient information input , the lending platform may trust statistical models to evaluate borrowers ’ creditworthiness .

zh-CN: 由于借款者通常借款金额很小，而且他们很有可能相互独立，这样一来个别的风险被分散了，整个贷款组合的风险也就降低了。
en-US: as the borrowers are usually small ones , they are very likely to be independent of each other , and idiosyncratic risks can be diversified away , lowering the overall risk of the lending portfolio .

zh-CN: 尽管统计模型不能百分百地保证对借款者评估的精确性，但长期而言，可靠的模型能实现稳定的精确度。
en-US: although statistical models do not guarantee 100 per cent accurate evaluations of borrowers , sound models can provide a stable accuracy ratio over time .

zh-CN: 然而，P2P平台对各个借款者的信用信息掌握有限，限制了P2P贷款的风险管理。
en-US: nevertheless , the limited access to the credit information of individual borrowers on p2p platforms constrains risk management in p2p lending .

zh-CN: 实际上，中国许多迅猛发展的P2P贷款平台根本没有进行基本的风险分散，更谈不上风险管理了。
en-US: the truth is that a lot of burgeoning p2p platforms in china have no basic risk diversification , not to mention the risk management .

zh-CN: 不过，要依据当前经验预测未来非常困难，甚至根本做不到。
en-US: yet predicting the future based on our current experience is very difficult , if ever possible .

zh-CN: 但是，一家贷款机构服务大客户还是小客户，取决于它采用何种风险管理流程。
en-US: nevertheless , whether choosing large clients or small clients depends on the risk management procedure a lending organization adopts .

zh-CN: 从这条原则出发，我猜测，未来互联网金融贷款将继续以小额贷款为主。
en-US: based on this principal , i would imagine online lending will keep focusing on small loans .

zh-CN: 尤其是，除了加强监管，建立可靠又低成本的信用信息平台，是P2P贷款行业迎来真正大发展的关键。
en-US: in particular , establishing a reliable and inexpensive credit information platform is the key to the real boom of p2p lending industry , in addition to strengthening regulation .

zh-CN: 对传统银行而言，随着利率自由化进程的推进，发展小额贷款可能成为“必做之事”。
en-US: for banks , as interest rate liberalisation proceeds , lending to small borrowers may become a “ must do ” .

zh-CN: 在这种情况下，传统银行需要找到办法，降低信息收集和信用评估流程的成本。
en-US: in this case , banks need to find a way to lower the cost of information collection and credit evaluation procedure .

zh-CN: 梁晓钟为中国银监会(CBRC)一部副调研员
en-US: liang xiaozhong is deputy director of the china banking regulatory commission

zh-CN: 本文所表达的看法与观点仅代表作者本人，不代表中国银监会的官方政策或立场。
en-US: the views and opinions expressed in this article are those of the author and do not necessarily reflect the official policy or position of china banking regulatory commission .

zh-CN: 在被问及自己的妻子时，坐在宽大象牙色扶手椅上的陈东升突然直起身子，但仍保持着镇静。
en-US: on being asked about his wife , chen dongsheng stiffens in his large ivory-coloured armchair , but stays calm .

zh-CN: 对于涉及孔冬梅的问题，他的办公室主任兼翻译脸上露出的似乎更多是厌倦，而不是担忧。
en-US: his office manager and translator looks more weary than worried by a question about kong dongmei .

zh-CN: 在中国，“关系”历来是个重要的东西，但近些年来，猖獗的腐败现象使得人们心中对几乎所有此类关系都产生了难以消除的深深鄙夷。
en-US: in china , guanxi , or connections , have always been important , but rampant corruption in recent years has in-grained a deep cynicism about al-most all such links .

zh-CN: 孔冬梅是新中国奠基人毛泽东的外孙女，于2011年嫁给了陈东升。此后，这对夫妇便开始引来媒体充满影射的报道。
en-US: ms kong is a granddaughter of mao zedong , foun-der of the people ’ s republic of china and after mr chen married ms kong in 2011 , the couple began to attract innuendo-laden media coverage .

zh-CN: 孔冬梅比现年56岁的陈东升小十多岁，曾供职于陈的保险公司泰康人寿，在该公司刚刚创建时便参与进来。
en-US: ms kong , a decade younger than 56 - year-old mr chen , has worked at his insurance company , taikang life , since its earliest days .

zh-CN: 她还协助经营着一家位于北京的文化中心，以及一家专门介绍中共历史的书屋。她写过几本关于她外公的书，但招致了一些人的非议，说她利用她外公的遗产赚钱。
en-US: she also helps run a beijing cultural centre and bookshop dedicated to communist history , and has written books about her grandfather , leading some to denigrate her for profiting from his legacy .

zh-CN: 采访陈东升时，我们按照外交礼节相邻而坐，头顶上方悬挂着巨大的中国古典画。“一般来说，私人的事情我不回答。”陈东升说。
en-US: “ usually , i do not answer questions on my private life , ” mr chen says , as we sit side by side in diplomatic formation beneath large , classical chinese paintings .

zh-CN: “（但）可以这样讲，我夫人的关系和我的生意，应该讲是没有太多关系的，甚至说没有关系。”
en-US: “ [ but ] i can say that the connection of my wife has not much to do , or even has no relationship , with my business . ”

zh-CN: 此处提到的“生意”可不止一个。
en-US: that should be businesses .

zh-CN: 陈东升在中国创建了三个民营企业，并始终是每个企业最大的股东。
en-US: mr chen has founded three private companies in china and remains the largest shareholder of each .

zh-CN: 他的名片显示，他是泰康人寿董事长兼首席执行官。泰康是中国仅有的一家无政府直接投资的全国性寿险公司，也是中国以新业务销售额计的第四大寿险公司。
en-US: his business card shows he is chief executive and chairman of taikang life , china ’ s only national life insurer with no direct government ownership , and the country’s fourth biggest by new business sales .

zh-CN: 陈东升的名片背面印着他的另一些头衔：中国嘉德创始人兼董事长、以及宅急送创始人。中国嘉德是世界第三大艺术品拍卖行，仅次于苏富比(Soth-eby's)和佳士得(Christie's)。宅急送是一家总部位于北京的快递公司，目前由陈东升的哥哥经营。
en-US: the card ’ s flipside denotes his other roles : founder and chairman of china guardian , the world ’ s third biggest fine art auction house after soth-eby ’ s and christie ’ s ; and founder of zjs express , a beijing-based delivery company run by mr chen ’ s brother .

zh-CN: 这三个企业都是陈东升白手起家创办的，起始时间是上世纪90年代初。1992年，中国事实上的领导人邓小平展开“南巡”，借此来推动市场改革。
en-US: he set up all three companies from scratch , starting in the early 1990 s when deng xiaoping , then the chinese leader , undertook his “ southern tour ” in 1992 to promote market ref-orms .

zh-CN: 邓当时的想法是，让中国从其在1989年天安门事件后遭遇的政治、社会和经济低谷中重新振作起来。
en-US: deng wanted to stir china out of the political , social and econ-om-ic slump it entered after 1989 ’ s pro-democracy protests were crushed .

zh-CN: 陈东升坚持认为，这三个企业是靠走市场化、专业化的道路成长起来的。
en-US: mr chen insists the three companies grew by being professional and pursuing market-oriented strategies .

zh-CN: 他说，毛泽东的名字当然依旧有着很大的影响力，但毛家已经淡出政治很多年了。
en-US: the mao name does of course still carry great prestige but the mao family have faded from politics over many years , he says .

zh-CN: “最近有些议论说红二代和官二代不一样，（前者）当然有很高的荣誉荣耀、很瞩目，但是（他们）其实和现实的政治、现实的经济没有太大的关系。”
en-US: “ there is a saying that the hong-er-dai [ second generation reds ] is different from the guan-er-dai [ second generation officials ] , ” he says . “ for sure [ the former ] enjoy great glory and are in the spotlight , but they don ’ t have much relationship with real politics and the economy . ”

zh-CN: 但是，这样一个背景意味着，“我们做事更要谨慎，（因为）不管你做的对或不对，都会引起很多的猜忌和不认同”。
en-US: such connections , however , mean “ we have to be more cautious , as whether you do it right or wrong , you always attract jealousy and disapproval ” .

zh-CN: 然而，陈东升坚定地认为，他的企业的蓬勃发展是“靠企业文化、靠核心竞争能力、靠团队、靠品牌服务，而不是靠政府的关系”。
en-US: however , he is adamant that his businesses thrive because of “ corporate culture , core competitiveness , teams and brands , and not [ through ] government connections ” .

zh-CN: 陈东升说话很有分寸，也不讲究华丽的仪表和做派。
en-US: his words are measured and mr chen himself is not flashy .

zh-CN: 采访当天，他穿得很朴素，长长的花白鬓角和低拢的额发与中国政治领导人油光乌亮的发式相比，仿佛来自另一个时代。
en-US: today he is dressed plainly and his long , greying sideburns and low-rise quiff are from a different era to the shining jet-black coiffures of china ’ s political leaders .

zh-CN: 泰康的办公室格调高雅，没有豪华的陈设，尽管在高管办公层的前台后方立着一架与周围环境不协调的小型三角钢琴。
en-US: taikang ’ s offices are smart rather than opulent , although a baby-grand piano stands incongruously be-hind the executive floor receptionists .

zh-CN: 谈到后来，陈东升对官二代提出了更为直接的批评。
en-US: later , mr chen levels a more direct criticism at the guan-er-dai .

zh-CN: “红二代没有索取利益，他们还保持了当年革命的本色，”他说道，“现在领导的孩子们——官二代——他们利用手中的权力、各种关系赚了很多钱。”
en-US: “ the hong-er-dai didn ’ t take ad-vantage and [ maintained ] a revolutionary quality , ” he says . “ the children of the recent government officials , however , made lots of money through their connection and power . ”

zh-CN: 不论是陈东升的私人朋友，还是与他的企业打过交道的人士，都呼应了他对自己成功之路的描述。
en-US: people who know mr chen personally or have dealt with his companies echo his depiction of his path to success .

zh-CN: 保险业高管和银行家们称，陈东升极其聪明和勤奋，是个富有魅力的领导者。他手下的22万名销售代理人为他创造了60%的利润，而这是通过挨家挨户推销寿险产品做到的。亚洲很多地方的销售代理人目前仍在采取这种做法。
en-US: insurance executives and bankers describe him as extremely bright and hard working , and a charismatic leader of the 220,000 sales agents who deliver 60 per cent of his profits by selling life products door to door , as agents still do across much of asia .

zh-CN: 陈东升最初迷上从商时，放弃了中国对外贸易经济合作部（这个位于北京的中央部委后来被中国商务部取代）助理研究员的“铁饭碗”。
en-US: when mr chen first got the business bug he left a safe job as an assistant researcher in the former ministry of international business and cooperation in beijing .

zh-CN: 四年后，中国保险业向民间资本开放，泰康得以拿到牌照。
en-US: it took four years for china to open up insurance to private capital and allow taikang to win a licence .

zh-CN: 从那以后，中国嘉德一直由共同创始人王雁南管理，陈东升则专注于泰康的业务。
en-US: since then , china guardian has been run by co-founder wang yannan , while mr chen focused on taikang .

zh-CN: 一提起中国央行近日发起的打击货币投机者的战役，就会回想起当年那场著名的“对阵”——一方是中国政府，另一方是乔治?索罗斯(GeorgeSoros)们管理的神秘对冲基金。
en-US: the notion that the chinese central bank is waging a campaign against currency speculators conjures up an image of beijing taking on shadowy hedge funds managed by george soros and his cohorts .

zh-CN: 然而，这次战役没上次那么精彩，且更多是发生在中国国内：大部分投机人民币升值的活动都是长期投资，投资者多是中国人，包括国有企业，而不是国际金融家。
en-US: the reality is more prosaic and hits closer to home : much of the so-called speculation on renminbi appreciation has been longer-term investment , and many of the investors are chinese actors , including state-owned companies , rather than global financiers .

zh-CN: 人民币汇率在过去一周里下跌1%，这是2005年中国引入新汇率制度以来，人民币最急剧的一次贬值。通过引导这次汇率下跌，中国央行重新赋予人民币汇率不确定性。
en-US: by guiding the renminbi down by 1 per cent over the past week – its steepest depreciation since china introduced a new currency system in 2005 – the people ’ s bank of china has rekindled uncertainty about the exchange rate .

zh-CN: 和中国央行打交道的银行职员和交易员们表示，央行希望通过此举促使中国企业在押注人民币持续升值时更加谨慎。这种谨慎本身就可以为人民币升值降速。
en-US: in so doing , bankers and traders who deal with the pboc say it wants to encourage chinese companies to be more cautious before betting on sustained appreciation – caution which in itself could slow the renminbi ’ s rise .

zh-CN: 2012年初中国扩大人民币日交易区间时，就表示将增加人民币的灵活性，升降都有可能。
en-US: in early 2012 when beijing widened the renminbi ’ s daily trading band , it vowed to make the currency more volatile , as likely to fall as it is to rise .

zh-CN: 但那年9月以来，人民币却一路升值，兑美元汇率上升了5%。
en-US: but since september of that year , it had drifted upwards without interruption , gaining 5 per cent against the dollar .

zh-CN: 上海某银行的一位策略师说：“央行尽可以大谈特谈（汇率）双向波动，但这一年半来人民币只升不降，不用脑子想都知道要借入美元。这不是投机，这是理所当然的事情。”
en-US: “ the pboc can scream its head off about two-way [ exchange rate ] volatility , but for the past year and a half , the renminbi has only risen. it was a no-brainer to borrow dollars. it wasn ’ t speculation. it was a sure thing , ” said a bank strategist in shanghai .

zh-CN: 中国企业押注人民币升值的主要方式是在境外（主要是香港）借入美元，然后将资金汇回中国内地。
en-US: the main way in which chinese companies have bet on a stronger renminbi is by borrowing dollars offshore , mainly in hong kong , and remitting that money into the mainland .

zh-CN: 持有美元债务的优势很明显：人民币升值将减轻最终偿债负担，而更重要的是，离岸市场的利率要远远低于中国境内的利率。
en-US: the advantages of dollar debt are clear : the renminbi ’ s appreciation makes eventual repayment easier and , more importantly , offshore interest rates are much lower than chinese rates .

zh-CN: 瑞银(UBS)估计，单是过去12个月，香港和新加坡的银行就向中国内地企业发放贷款约2000亿美元，其中1700亿美元被转回中国内地。
en-US: ubs estimates that banks in hong kong and singapore have lent mainland companies around $200 bn over the past 12 months alone and that $170 bn of this has been sent back to the mainland .

zh-CN: 中国企业在离岸债券市场也十分活跃。
en-US: chinese companies have also been highly active in offshore bond markets .

zh-CN: 上述离岸贷款中的一部分被用于纯粹投机的套利交易。
en-US: some of that offshore borrowing went into purely speculative carry trades .

zh-CN: 投资者用这些钱在中国炒房，或是购买高收益的影子银行产品。
en-US: investors used it to take punts on the chinese property market or to buy high-yielding shadow-bank products .

zh-CN: 不过，随着房地产公司在融资方面变得越来越依赖香港，大部分资金还是流入了实体经济。
en-US: but much of it also went to the “ real ” economy , with property companies becoming particularly reliant on hong kong for financing .

zh-CN: 比如，在中国内地最大的房地产开发商之一、国有的中国海外发展有限公司，离岸债务占到了其债务总额的87%。
en-US: offshore debt accounts for 87 per cent of the total debt of china overseas land and investment , a state-owned company that is one of the mainland ’ s biggest real estate developers .

zh-CN: 企业在以美元借入而用人民币花出去时，作为安全保障，应该对它们的外汇风险敞口作对冲操作。
en-US: safe investing practice dictates that companies borrowing in dollars to spend renminbi should hedge their currency exposure .

zh-CN: 正常情况下，它们会买入特定合约，保证在未来偿还贷款时，按照议定的汇率支付美元。
en-US: normally , they would buy contracts that guarantee them dollars at an agreed-upon price in the future when they need to repay the loans .

zh-CN: 然而，人民币的连续升值改变了他们的想法。
en-US: but the relentless appreciation of the renminbi changed that calculation .

zh-CN: 澳新银行(ANZ)分析师周皓（音译）表示：“由于贷款者认为不会有风险，许多人决定两年内以即期价格持有美元。”
en-US: “ because borrowers thought there was no risk , many just decided to take the dollar spot price in two years ’ time , ” said zhou hao , an analyst with anz .

zh-CN: 如果中国央行能使人民币汇率再次波动起来，那将迫使离岸贷款者对冲相关风险，这将压制人民币升值势头。
en-US: if the pboc could make the renminbi regain volatility , it will force people borrowing offshore to hedge their risk and that will work against renminbi appreciation .

zh-CN: 中国企业针对他们的美元收入实施大量对冲操作。
en-US: the one area in which chinese companies have hedged heavily has been in covering their exposure to dollar earnings .

zh-CN: 中国的出口商赚取美元收入，却以人民币支付成本，它们在购买衍生品方面一直非常积极。
en-US: exporters , which earn dollars but pay costs in renminbi , have been highly active in buying derivatives .

zh-CN: 比如，据摩根士丹利估计，自2013年初以来，一种名为“目标可赎回远期合约”的产品已销售了3500亿美元，这种产品在人民币升值到一定水平时就会产生回报。
en-US: for example , morgan stanley estimates that $350 bn of target redemption forwards – a product that pays out when the renminbi rises to a certain level – have been sold since the start of 2013 .

zh-CN: 一旦人民币汇率下跌加剧，出口商就可能面临巨额亏损。不过，将此类衍生品的走俏完全归咎于投机行为也是不对的。
en-US: a steeper fall in the renminbi could lead to big losses for exporters , but it would be wrong to blame speculation alone for the boom in these derivatives .

zh-CN: 德意志银行策略师刘立男表示：“出口的改善也是一个关键因素。出口商做了大量对冲，不过有的人可能更激进，对冲过度了。”
en-US: “ better export performance was also a key factor . it was largely hedging , though some might have over-hedged and taken a more aggressive view , ” said liu linan , a strategist with deutsche bank .

zh-CN: 今年初香港对人民币的旺盛需求，也使中国汇率问题变得更为复杂。
en-US: strong demand for renminbi in hong kong at the start of this year also added to the complications in china .

zh-CN: 北京一家银行的一位外汇交易员说，由于人民币在香港存在溢价，中国石油企业（它们是中国企业中最大的美元买家）转赴香港买入美元。
en-US: because the renminbi was trading at a premium in hong kong , chinese oil companies – the country’s biggest corporate buyers of dollars – shifted there to buy dollars , according to a currency trader with a bank in beijing .

zh-CN: 这导致中国境内美元需求下降，给境内人民币带来了更大升值压力。
en-US: the resulting drop in dollar demand in china fuelled more appreciation pressure in the mainland market .

zh-CN: 而本周人民币下跌则逆转了这一态势。
en-US: that has gone into reverse with this week ’ s drop in the renminbi .

zh-CN: 在香港，企业和投资者纷纷减持人民币头寸，以致人民币在这个离岸市场的跌幅甚至超过了中国内地市场，消除了香港的人民币溢价。
en-US: as companies and investors in hong kong unwind their positions , the currency ’ s fall in the offshore market has been even steeper than in china , eliminating the hong kong premium .

zh-CN: 这位交易员表示：“石油企业已重返在岸市场买入美元。这正是中国央行希望见到的。”
en-US: “ the oil companies have come back onshore to buy dollars. that is what the pboc wanted to see , ” the trader said .

zh-CN: 世界上大多数互联网巨头都在抢着收购移动领域的应用和初创企业，收购目标包括WhatsApp、高德(AutoNavi)和Viber。
en-US: most of the world ’ s internet titans are snapping up mobile apps and start-ups , from whatsapp to autonavi to viber .

zh-CN: 新浪(Sina)却反其道而行之。
en-US: sina is going the opposite way .

zh-CN: 该公司已为分拆其新浪微博(Weibo)平台指定了银行。新浪微博是中国市场上一个类似推特(Twitter)的微博网站。
en-US: it has appointed banks for a partial spinout of its weibo platform , a twitter-like microblog for the chinese market .

zh-CN: 为什么新浪会在其他公司抢着进入市场时退出这一市场？
en-US: why exit as others mob the entrance ?

zh-CN: 目前，新浪尚未就此给出任何细节。
en-US: sina has given no details yet .

zh-CN: 该公司并不缺乏现金。
en-US: it doesn’t need the cash .

zh-CN: 截止去年9月，该公司持有的净现金为12亿美元，等于其目前市值的四分之一，接近其2012年现金消耗量的4倍（2013年的现金流数据还未公布）。
en-US: it held $1.2bn in net cash as of september – equivalent to a quarter of its current market capitalisation and nearly four times its 2012 cash burn ( cash flow data for 2013 are not yet available ) .

zh-CN: 这意味着追求更高市值是最有可能的动机。
en-US: that leaves the desire for a higher valuation as the most likely motive .

zh-CN: 去年4月，阿里巴巴(Alibaba)购买了新浪微博18%的股份，这一交易对该平台的估值达到33亿美元。
en-US: alibaba bought an 18 per cent stake in sina ’ s weibo in april , stamping it with a value of $3.3bn .

zh-CN: 不过，自那时以来，大型成长型移动通信资产的价格节节攀升。
en-US: but the prices of big and growing mobile communications assets have risen merrily since then .

zh-CN: 新浪微博去年第三季度的日常活跃用户数高达6000万，据巴克莱银行(Barclays)估计，该平台每月用户数为1.95亿。
en-US: weibo had 60 m daily active users in the third quarter of last year , and barclays reckons it has 195 m monthly users .

zh-CN: 市场对于Facebook和推特的每月用户数的估值分别是每个用户价值142美元和126美元。
en-US: the market values the monthly users at facebook and twitter at $142 and $126 apiece , respectively .

zh-CN: 日本乐天(Rakuten)收购Viber时，对其用户的估值为90美元。
en-US: rakuten ’ s purchase of viber rates its users at $90 .

zh-CN: Facebook刚刚为WhatsApp的每位注册用户支付了大约42美元。
en-US: facebook just paid about $42 a subscriber for whatsapp .

zh-CN: 根据以上最后一个数据，新浪微博的估值应为82亿美元（采用显然不准确的估值方法）。
en-US: using that last figure , weibo would be worth $8.2bn ( on what is clearly a very imprecise valuation method ) .

zh-CN: 那么，新浪所持的71%股份应值58亿美元，而新浪的总市值才有49亿美元。
en-US: sina ’ s 71 per cent stake is then worth $5.8bn – against sina ’ s total market capitalisation of $4.9bn .

zh-CN: 这种估值的逻辑也许很难理解。
en-US: the logic of the valuations may be hard to understand .

zh-CN: 但急于追求这种估值的心情不难理解。
en-US: the urge to chase them is not .

zh-CN: 这就留下了两个问题。
en-US: this leaves two issues outstanding .

zh-CN: 首先，新浪其余资产怎么了？
en-US: first , what happens to the rest of sina ?

zh-CN: 该公司另一大业务是互联网广告销售。
en-US: its other business is selling internet advertising .

zh-CN: 这一部分业务增长相对较为缓慢，而新浪披露的资料让人很难了解其盈利能力。
en-US: that is a slower-growth business , and sina disclosures make it difficult to know how profitable it is .

zh-CN: 其次：阿里巴巴会怎么做？
en-US: second : where is alibaba ?

zh-CN: 阿里巴巴可以选择将其持有的新浪微博股份增至30%。
en-US: it has an option to increase its stake to 30 per cent .

zh-CN: 如果该公司不在新浪微博分拆上市之前这么做，投资者可能会感到恐慌——恰逢他们对“移动”板块股票的兴奋见顶。
en-US: if it does not do so before the float , investors may be spooked – just as their excitement about all things mobile is peaking .

zh-CN: 默克尔支持建立“欧洲版”互联网
en-US: merkel joins anti-us spying push

zh-CN: 德国总理安格拉•默克尔支持有关让欧洲建立与美国隔离的互联网服务的呼吁。
en-US: german chancellor angela merkel has thrown her weight behind calls for europe to develop internet services that are walled off from the us .

zh-CN: 默克尔是在上周末发表这番言论的。美国总统巴拉克•奥巴马此前曾做出大量努力，试图平息欧洲对于前合同工爱德华•斯诺登揭露的美国国家安全局(NSA)监听事件的愤怒，包括有文件显示，美国间谍机构曾窃听默克尔手机。
en-US: ms merkel’s weekend comments come despite intensive efforts by president barack obama to quell european anger over the national security agency revelations made public by former contractor edward snowden , including documents that showed that us spy agencies had tapped ms merkel’s mobile phone .

zh-CN: 默克尔表示，她将在本周三在巴黎与法国总统弗朗索瓦•奥朗德会谈时，敦促奥朗德支持在欧盟(EU)建立替代网络、取代当前由美国主导的互联网基础设施的举措。
en-US: ms merkel said she would press french president franois hollande to back the push for eu-based alternatives to the current us-dominated internet infrastructure when she holds talks in paris on wednesday .

zh-CN: 默克尔在她的每周播客中表示：“我们将与法国商讨我们如何能够保持高水平的数据保护。”
en-US: “ we ’ll talk with france about how we can maintain a high level of data protection , ” ms merkel said in her weekly podcast .

zh-CN: “最重要的是，我们将与向我们的公民提供安全的欧洲提供商讨论，这样人们就不必跨越大西洋发送电子邮件和其他信息了。”
en-US: “ above all , we ’ll talk with european providers that offer security for our citizens , so that one shouldn ’ t have to send emails and other information across the atlantic . ”

zh-CN: 一家拒绝具名的美国公司表示，有关美国如何与采用这种尚未界定的新式服务的国家之间传输电子邮件，尚存在疑问。
en-US: one us company , which refused to be named , said there were questions over the practicalities of how email between the us and countries in this undefined new service would work .

zh-CN: 一些科技专家警告称，在欧洲建立替代网络的提议没有考虑到互联网的运行方式，也没有考虑到美国企业仍有法律义务将信息移交给美国国家安全局，不管这些信息存在何处。
en-US: some tech experts have warned that proposals to build alternative networks in europe fail to take account of how the internet operates , or the continued legal obligation of american companies to turn information over to the nsa , no matter where it is stored .

zh-CN: 默克尔决定亲自出面，支持以欧盟为中心的互联网服务，此举反映出这个问题在德国充满政治色彩。
en-US: ms merkel’s decision to throw her personal backing behind eu-centric internet services reflects how politically charged the issue is in germany .

zh-CN: 阿里巴巴将在美国推出电商网站
en-US: alibaba opens the door to us platform

zh-CN: 长期以来为美国品牌与中国供应商牵线搭桥的中国电子商务企业阿里巴巴(Alibaba)，如今希望帮助商家将商品销售给美国消费者。
en-US: alibaba , the chinese ecommerce company that has long -connected us brands to chinese suppliers , now wants to help sell goods to american -consumers .

zh-CN: 该公司昨日宣布，将在美国推出首个由其持有多数股权的电子商务网站。阿里巴巴正计划进行首次公开发行(IPO)，分析师表示，其估值可能超过1000亿美元。
en-US: the company , which is poised for an initial public offering that analysts say could value it at more than $100 bn , announced yesterday that it would launch its first majority-owned ecommerce venture in the us .

zh-CN: 阿里巴巴在美国的两家子公司Vendio和Auctiva将很快推出一个企业对消费者网站“11Main”。
en-US: two of alibaba ’ s us subsidiaries , vendio and auctiva , will soon launch a business-to-consumer site , called 11 main .

zh-CN: 阿里巴巴表示，新网站将是一个精品电子商务平台，销售来自“精选店主”的“富有趣味的高质量产品”。除此之外，阿里巴巴没有透露更多有关“11Main”的细节。
