zh-CN: 早在4万年前，地球上还存在另外三个人种：欧洲的尼安德塔人，印度尼西亚佛洛里斯岛上的"霍比特人"，以及最近才发现的一个叫丹尼索瓦人的神秘人种，该人种曾居住在亚洲中部。
en-US: as recently as 40,000 years ago there were three other species of human on earth : neanderthals in europe , the " hobbits " of flores , in indonesia , and a recently discovered and still mysterious group of creatures called the denisovans , who lived in central asia .

zh-CN: 而现在，人们在非洲又找到了另一个人种存在的证据，该人种在人类进化史上出现的时间更早，距今约不到200万年。
en-US: and now there is evidence that similar diversity existed earlier in human history , a little under 2m years ago , in africa .

zh-CN: 这些发表在《自然》杂志上的证据是由肯尼亚首都内罗毕的图尔卡纳盆地研究所的一个研究小组提供的。该研究小组的领导人米芙•利基来自一个著名的古生物学研究家族，
en-US: this evidence , just published in nature , has been provided by a team led by meave leakey of the turkana basin institute in nairobi , kenya. dr leakey is a member of an illustrious palaeontological clan .

zh-CN: 研究人类化石记录最大的问题是资源稀缺，总是这儿一块颚骨，那儿一块头骨。
en-US: the problem with studying humanity's fossil record is that it is so sparse : a jawbone here ; a braincase there .

zh-CN: 而且研究者通常很难分辨它们是否来自同一人种。
en-US: often , it is difficult to know if different bones have come from the same species or not .

zh-CN: 即便是同一人种，不同样本也会给人带来误导，两块看起来像是来自不同人种的骨头实际上可能分属于同一人种的男性和女性。
en-US: even multiple examples of the same type of bone can mislead. what looks like two species might actually be the male and the female of one .

zh-CN: 这种极易混淆的情况一直困扰着那些想要解读图尔卡纳湖附近人类化石的研究者们。
en-US: such confusion has bedevilled the interpretation of the human fossils found near lake turkana .

zh-CN: 有一些古生物学家认为人种是单一的，即只有能人一种，其他人种都是能人的变异体。
en-US: some palaeontologists see a single , variable species called homo habilis .

zh-CN: 而利基博士与她的团队（该团队成员还包括利基家族的第三代人，即利基的女儿路易斯）最新发现的人类化石或许可以帮忙理清这些人种之间的关系。
en-US: the new fossils found by dr leakey and her team ( which includes a third leakey generation in the form of her daughter , louise ) may , however , help clear up what is going on .

zh-CN: 这些新发现的样本中有一个被标为KMN-ER62000的新样本，其脸型与卢尔多夫人样本（该化石是用来鉴别卢尔多夫人人种的一个样本，如果研究者能用此种方式辨认出样本属于卢尔多夫人种）的脸型相似，尽管62000样本看起来像是来自一个青少年，而卢尔多夫人化石样本则属于一个成年人。
en-US: one of the new specimens , known as kmn-er 62000 , has a face like the type specimen of homo rudolfensis ( the fossil that defines the species , if species it turns out to be ) , though it seems to be from an adolescent , whereas the type specimen is an adult .

zh-CN: 关键是，62000样本拥有一个保存相当完好的上颌，而这正是这一类型的样本所缺少的。
en-US: crucially , 62000 has a reasonably well-preserved upper jaw , which the type specimen lacks .

zh-CN: 一张电脑重建图（见上图）显示这一上颌与利基博士发现的第二个人种的一个下颌样本（KMN-ER60000）十分吻合。
en-US: a computer reconstruction ( see diagram ) suggests this upper jaw meshes well with the second of dr leakey's discoveries , a lower jaw ( kmn-er 60000 ) .

zh-CN: 由于两块骨头分属两个年龄不同的人，因此利基博士并不认为这两块骨头是来自同一个人的，但看起来这两块骨头的主人属于同一人种，即卢尔多夫人。
en-US: she is not suggesting they are from the same individual , since they are of different ages , but they seem to come from the same species , namely homo rudolfensis .

zh-CN: 同样重要的是，另一张电脑重建图显示，62000样本的上颌与KMN-ER1802样本并不吻合。
en-US: equally significantly , a different computer reconstruction shows that the upper jaw of 62000 does not match another famous fossil from the area , known as kmn-er 1802 .

zh-CN: KMN-ER1802这块有名的样本化石同样来自这个地区，1973年人们发现它时曾认为这块下颌骨可能属于卢尔多夫人种。
en-US: this was found in 1973 and had previously been thought likely to be the lower jaw of rudolfensis .

zh-CN: 现在人们仍旧无法弄清1802样本到底属于哪个人种。
en-US: what 1802 actually is , is now obscure .

zh-CN: 这一推理链认为它是卢尔多夫人，并以人种的两性差异来解释其外形差异；但这一差异实在太大，除非这一人种的两性差异在其他灵长类动物中见所未见方能自圆其说。
en-US: it is too different from what this chain of reasoning suggests was the shape of homo rudolfensis to be explained by sexual dimorphism , unless the sexes differed in this species in ways not seen in any other primate .

zh-CN: 但之前人们之所以将其归为卢尔多夫人种是因为它看起来也并不像是能人的下颌。
en-US: but its previous attribution was made because it does not look much like homo habilis either .

zh-CN: 这样看起，在距今不到200万年前，曾有三个人种在东非大草原上生活过：能人，卢尔多夫人，以及一个尚未被命名的人种。
en-US: it seems then that at least two , and possibly three species of homo were stalking the east-african savannah a little under 2m years ago : habilis , rudolfensis and something as yet unnamed .

zh-CN: 利基家族一直都致力于研究人类大家族的历史，现在二者之间的关系交织在一起，使历史更加复杂了。
en-US: the intertwining history of the human family and the leakey family has just become even more complicated .

zh-CN: 有研究显示，看一部能让您开心、乐呵呵的片子对身心都有好处，特别是心血管健康方面。
en-US: watching a film that makes you laugh is good for your heart , according to a study .

zh-CN: 据悉，一部能使人发笑的电影可以对人体的血管起到优化作用，这是相对看了战争片以及惊悚片后的比较而言的。
en-US: researchers found watching a movie or programme that produces laughter has a positive effect on vascular function and is opposite to that observed after watching a war or horror film that causes mental stress 。

zh-CN: 在实验中，研究员让志愿者看了喜剧片演的《关于玛丽的一切》以及战争片《拯救大兵瑞恩》，在观察志愿者观看影片后的反映进行分析对比。
en-US: in the study volunteers watched segments of a funny film - such as there's something about mary starring cameron diaz - on one day and on another day watched the opening segment of the stressful war film saving private ryan 。

zh-CN: 领衔实验的研究员DrMichaelMiller说：“在实验中，当志愿者观看惊悚片时，他们的血管收缩呈现不健康的反映，比如--减小血管直径使供给某区域的血流减少，换句话来说就是血流量减少速度过快。这证明了先前实验的结论--精神压力大与血管收缩之间有直接的联系。”
en-US: lead investigator dr michael miller from the university of maryland school of medicine in the u.s. said that when the volunteers watched the stressful film , their blood vessel lining developed a potentially unhealthy response called vasoconstriction , reducing blood flow. he said this finding confirms previous studies , which suggested there was a link between mental stress and the narrowing of blood vessels 。

zh-CN: 与之相反，在观看完喜剧片之后，志愿者的“血管直径”与观看惊悚片后相比，呈现30%到50%的差异，结论证明，乐观的心态、经常大笑有益心血管健康。
en-US: however , after watching the funny movie , the blood vessel lining expanded. overall , more than 300 measurements were made with a 30 to 50 per cent difference in blood vessel diameter between the laughter and mental stress phases. dr miller said : ' the take-home message here is that laughter is great for your heart 。

zh-CN: 一项新研究表明，婴儿出生的月份会影响他将来从事的职业方向。
en-US: the time of year a baby is born can shape what profession they will embark on in later life , a new study has suggested 。

zh-CN: 英国国家统计局的研究发现，有数据显示，出生在哪个月将影响其未来从事的职业。
en-US: being born in a certain month appears to indicate the statistical likelihood of what job a person will end up with , the study by the office for national statistics found 。

zh-CN: 研究人员发现，婴儿出生的月份还会对从智力到寿命的各个方面产生影响。
en-US: researchers have uncovered that the month in which babies are born could also affect everything from intelligence to length of life 。

zh-CN: 他们发现，十二月出生的小孩将来更可能成为一名牙医，而生日在一月份的小孩则更可能成为一名收债人。
en-US: a child born december is more likely to become a dentist while someone whose birthday falls in january will tend to a debt collector , they found 。

zh-CN: 出生在二月份的小孩成为艺术家的几率更高，而三月份出生的宝宝似乎更可能成为飞行员。
en-US: a february birth appears to increase the chances of being an artist while march babies appear to go on to become pilots 。

zh-CN: 此外，四月和五月出生的小孩从事各类职业的几率都比较均等，在夏天出生的小孩成为高收入的足球运动员、医生或牙医的几率要低得多。
en-US: meanwhile , april and may are said to have a fairly even spread of professions , births in the summer months mean a much lower chance of becoming a high-earning football player , doctor or dentist 。

zh-CN: 据《每日邮报》报道，研究人员分析了从事19类不同职业的人的出生月份，从而得出这一结论。该研究采用了来自上一次人口普查的信息。
en-US: the study was derived by researchers who analysed the birth months of people in 19 separate occupations using information from the last census , the daily mail reported 。

zh-CN: 尽管这些趋向性也许难以解释，但是出生月份和特定健康问题之间的关联却是有科学根据的。
en-US: although these trends may be difficult to explain , correlations between birth months and specific health problems have a scientific basis 。

zh-CN: 春天出生的小孩患精神分裂症、老年痴呆症、哮喘和自闭症等疾病的风险会更大。
en-US: spring babies are at greater risk of illnesses including schizophrenia , alzheimer ’ s disease , asthma and autism 。

zh-CN: 他们可能也会不如其他月份出生的同学聪明。
en-US: they may also be less clever than classmates born in other parts of the year 。

zh-CN: 很多人说，或许当我们还处在原始人时代的时候，他们就从外星来到地球改变我们的DNA和其他遗传形式。
en-US: many people say that they probably came to this planet and altered our dna and other genetic forms while we were still primitives ?

zh-CN: 地球人是如何获取所有的技术的？
en-US: where do humans get all technology from ?

zh-CN: 还有那些出现在世界各国的“麦田怪圈”是怎么回事？
en-US: and how about those crop circles all around the world ?

zh-CN: 显然地球人在宇宙中并不孤单，但是我认为外星人也是善良的。因为如果他们是邪恶的，他们可能在很早以前就消灭我们了（以他们所拥有的先进技术不费吹灰之力）。
en-US: surely we are not alone , but i think they are good beings because if they were evil they would had eliminated us from along time ago , ( with all the technology they posses )

zh-CN: 同时，我们的祖先也信奉着一些奇怪的“神灵”，通过建造金字塔等一些活动来取悦于他们。
en-US: also our ancestors were devoted to some strange gods , building pyramids and all that stuff just to please them .

zh-CN: 有埃及人和玛雅人绘制的图画为证，画面上渺小的人类用飞行器指着月球。
en-US: there is evidence of egyptians and mayans drawings of little men pointing to the moon with suits and shuttles .

zh-CN: 在那个时代他们是如何得知这些航天知识的？
en-US: how come they knew so much about astronomy at that time ?

zh-CN: 我们从黑猩猩进化而来不令人信服。
en-US: it's not believable that we come from chimpazees .

zh-CN: 如果这是真实的，那么白种人和中国人是从哪里进化而来？
en-US: if that were true where does white and chinese people come from .

zh-CN: 因为他们一点也不像有大猩猩的基因啊。
en-US: they don't look anything alike to those creatures .

zh-CN: 人类又是怎么得知地球十亿年的年龄的（十亿这个数字可真是不小啊）。
en-US: how come humans know the age of our planet we are talking about billions and that number is not small .

zh-CN: 而按照推测，十亿年前我们根本不存在啊。
en-US: supposedly we didn't exist back then .

zh-CN: 这是多么的奇妙！
en-US: what an enigma !

zh-CN: 根据颜色对人们身心的不同作用，可以选择特定的颜色通过眼睛对人们的情绪施加影响。
en-US: according to the effects of colors on the human body and emotions , certain colors are selected to exert direct effects on the mind and emotions via eyes .

zh-CN: 这就是所谓的养眼养心。
en-US: this is the so-called pleasing the eyes and refreshing the mind .

zh-CN: 另外，色调、色温也可以用于调节情绪。
en-US: besides , the color tones , color temperatures , etc. may also be used to regulate emotions 。

zh-CN: 具体的方法是根据“五色-五脏-五情绪”理论，将住所、餐具、家具、服饰、棉被、窗帘、灯具甚至参与治疗的医生、护士的穿着等病人日常生活密切接触的东西按要求设为需要的颜色。
en-US: the method , under the guidance of the theory of " the five colors corresponding to the five zang organs and five emotions " , is used to arrange the colors of the patient's living surroundings such as living rooms , utensils , furnishings , clothes , quilts , window curtains and lights as well as the dresses of doctors and nurses of rehabilitation according to the requirements .

zh-CN: 各种颜色的作用如下：
en-US: colors and their indications are as follows 。

zh-CN: 暖色
en-US: warm colors

zh-CN: 红色和橙色，使人感觉温暖，兴奋和愉悦。
en-US: red and orange , with warm feeling , possess the actions of making people excited and joyful .

zh-CN: 这些颜色用于治疗抑郁、抑郁性精神病、嗜睡症、痴呆症等。
en-US: the colors are applicable to depression , depressive psychosis , lethargy , dementia , etc 。

zh-CN: 冷色
en-US: cold colors

zh-CN: 靛蓝色、蓝色、紫色和绿色能使人冷静、镇定、克制。
en-US: among indigo blue , blue , purple and green have the actions of cooling , tranquilizing and making people restrained .

zh-CN: 冷色用于治疗狂躁、易怒、失眠、恐惧、癫痫等。
en-US: cold colors are applicable to dysphoria , irascibility , insomnia , terror and fear as well as mania , epilepsy , etc 。

zh-CN: 令人愉悦的颜色
en-US: joyful colors

zh-CN: 红色和粉色使人愉悦，有节哀的作用。用于情绪低落、对悲伤过敏以及抑郁的治疗。
en-US: red and pink make people happy and have the action of restraining grief. the colors are applicable to people with low spirits , susceptibility to grief and cry ， and depression 。

zh-CN: 令人忧郁的颜色
en-US: sad colors

zh-CN: 除了抑制愤怒。黑色和白色还可以治疗对愤怒、狂喜过敏等。
en-US: black is mainly applied or white may also be used to restrict anger . both colors are applicable to susceptibility to anger , overjoy , etc 。

zh-CN: 令人恐惧的颜色
en-US: fearful color

zh-CN: 黑色用于抑制狂喜，对狂躁、笑病也有效。
en-US: black has the action of restricting overjoy. the color is applicable to mania , endless laughing , etc 。

zh-CN: 令人紧张的颜色
en-US: anxious colors

zh-CN: 黄色、浅蓝和浅绿有缓解恐惧，激发思维的作用。可治疗恐惧、注意力分散等症状。
en-US: yellow , light blue and light green possess the actions of restricting fear and benefiting thinking. the colors are applicable to terror , fear , distraction , etc 。

zh-CN: 周一美国调查人员声明，对于某些虚弱的人群，生气和其他强烈的情绪可能会引发潜在的致命的心脏疾病。
en-US: anger and other strong emotions can trigger potentially deadly heart rhythms in certain vulnerable people , us researchers said on monday .

zh-CN: 之前的研究已经表明，地震、战争、甚至输了一场世界杯都会增加突发心搏停止而死的机率，在这种情况下心脏停止了供血循环。
en-US: previous studies have shown that earthquakes , war or even the loss of a world cup soccer match can increase rates of death from sudden cardiac arrest , in which the heart stops circulating blood .

zh-CN: 耶鲁大学的RachelLampert博士说：“不同研究证实了当你处在一个压力过强的群体时，突然死亡的可能性将会增加，”她的研究发表在美国心脏病学院的期刊上。Lampert博士讲到：“我们的研究着手寻找它怎样影响心脏系统。”
en-US: " it's definitely been shown in all different ways that when you put a whole population under a stressor that sudden death will increase , " said dr. rachel lampert of yale university in new haven , connecticut , whose study appears in the journal of the american college of cardiology. " our study starts to look at how does this really affect the electrical system of the heart , " lampert said .

zh-CN: 她和她的研究团队研究了62例有心脏病和植入心脏的患者，发现了异常的心律或心律不齐的现象，并通过电击来恢复患者正常的心跳。
en-US: she and colleagues studied 62 patients with heart disease and implantable heart defibrillators or icds that can detect dangerous heart rhythms or arrhythmias and deliver an electrical shock to restore a normal heart beat .

zh-CN: Lampert博士在一次电话采访中讲到：“我们的这些研究对象有心率不齐的现象。”
en-US: " these were people we know already had some vulnerability to arrhythmia , " lampert said in a telephone interview .

zh-CN: 在这次研究中的患者参加了一项实验，这实验中要求这些患者回忆最近一次的发怒的情形。这个实验，Lampert的团队将其命名为T波变换实验，它是用来测量心电流的不稳定的现象。
en-US: patients in the study took part in an exercise in which they recounted a recent angry episode while lampert's team did a test called t-wave alternans that measures electrical instability in the heart .

zh-CN: Lampert博士说团队特别询问了一些问题来缓解这些发怒的情形。
en-US: lampert said the team specifically asked questions to get people to relive the angry episode .

zh-CN: “我们发现在实验室里，发怒增加了这些患者的心电流的不稳定。”她说
en-US: " we found in the lab setting that yes , anger did increase this electrical instability in these patients , " she said .

zh-CN: 接下来，他们连续追踪这些患者长达三年之久，检查哪些病人有心搏停止或者移植体内的电震发生器震动的状况。
en-US: next , they followed patients for three years to see which patients later had a cardiac arrest and needed a shock from their implantable defibrillator .

zh-CN: Lampert博士说，“那些有着最高的生气引发的心电流不稳定是其他患者患心率不齐机率的10倍。”
en-US: " the people who had the highest anger-induced electrical instability were 10 times more likely than everyone else to have an arrhythmia in follow-up , " she said .

zh-CN: Lampert博士说这项研究表明发怒是致命的，至少对于那些已经有心电流不稳定的人群是致命的。
en-US: lampert said the study suggests that anger can be deadly , at least for people who are already vulnerable to this type of electrical disturbance in the heart .

zh-CN: “这证明发怒将会导致心电流体系在某种情况下致使突然的死亡。”她说。
en-US: " it says yes , anger really does impact the heart's electrical system in very specific ways that can lead to sudden death , " she said .

zh-CN: 我们每个人都应该对自己每天的生活和选择所产生的温室气体负责。
en-US: each and every one of us is responsible for the greenhouse gases we emit in our daily actions and choices .

zh-CN: 因此，防止气候变化需要地球上的每个人共同来努力。
en-US: therefore , combating climate change is going to take the combined efforts of everyone on the planet .

zh-CN: 在中国，平均每户每年的碳排放量是2.41吨二氧化碳。
en-US: the average household carbon footprint in china is 2.41 tons of carbon dioxide annually .

zh-CN: 这足够填充半个奥运游泳池了。
en-US: that's enough to fill half an olympic swimming pool .

zh-CN: 吃惊么？好吧，就让我们来看看减少碳排放量的方法吧。
en-US: surprised ? well , here's how you can work to reduce it :

zh-CN: 建议采用喷头淋浴而非浴缸。缩短两分钟洗澡时间，省水同时为自己多争取两分钟睡眠时间。
en-US: take showers rather than baths and reduce your shower time by two minutes. this will save water and give you an extra two minutes in bed .

zh-CN: 不要购买不需要的衣物，对衣物料子的选择要谨慎。
en-US: don't purchase unnecessary clothes , and be careful about the materials you buy .

zh-CN: 羊毛和棉织品生产时排放的温室气体更多。
en-US: wool and cotton fabrics have a really high greenhouse gas impact .

zh-CN: 人造纤维，例如伸缩尼龙就是个更好的选择。
en-US: manmade fibers such as polyester are a better choice .

zh-CN: 门底或窗户缝进风时，没必要提高室内温度。
en-US: there's no point having the heat up high while the wind's blowing in under the door or sneaking in through the window .

zh-CN: 再密封一下窗户缝就可以留住热气了。
en-US: reseal all window frames to keep the heat in .

zh-CN: 尽量买高质量，寿命长的商品，尽管这可能会有一点贵。
en-US: try to buy high-quality , long-lasting products even though they may cost a little more .

zh-CN: 笔记本电脑比台式电脑效率更高，小屏幕电视比宽屏电视要好。
en-US: a laptop is more efficient than a desktop , and a small screen tv is better than a big flat - screen .

zh-CN: 热水器不用就别开，控制温度不要过热。
en-US: only turn the water heater on when necessary , and adjust temperature controls to avoid overheating .

zh-CN: 烧水时把壶盖盖好。
en-US: put a lid on a pan when boiling water .

zh-CN: 使用洗衣机时，确认满载，如果衣服不是很脏就把温度调低。
en-US: when using the washing machine , be sure there's a full load and turn the temperature down if it's not really grubby .

zh-CN: 和洗衣机一样位列"最贪婪"家电的就是电冰箱了。
en-US: the greediest home device along with the washing machine is the fridge .

zh-CN: 电冰箱要避免太阳直射，远离微波炉或加热器，尽量保证它的工作效率。
en-US: make sure it's as efficient as possible by keeping it out of direct sunlight and away from the oven or heater .

zh-CN: 另外，切记不要把热的食物放进冰箱。
en-US: don't put food in when it's still warm .

zh-CN: 这一点很明显也很重要：不使用时，关掉所有电器，包括灯。
en-US: this is obvious , but essential : switch off all appliances when you ' re not using them. this includes lights .

zh-CN: 使用节能灯泡节省能源。
en-US: conserve energy by using efficient light bulbs .

zh-CN: 它们的耗电量仅是普通灯泡的三分之一，持续时间却是后者的10倍。
en-US: they use about one-third of the energy of normal bulbs and last 10 times as long .

zh-CN: 取消不必要的打印工作，纸张两面都可打印，尽量减少页边空白。
en-US: only print things out when necessary , and print double-sided and reduce the margins .

zh-CN: 在单位尽量使用自己的杯子和餐具。
en-US: take your own mug and cutlery to work .

zh-CN: 这能减少一次性杯子和餐具的废弃量--但是，这就意味着洗餐具要消耗很多水。
en-US: this saves throwing away disposable cups and containers-- but that could be outweighed by washing your cutlery .

zh-CN: 因此，洗餐具时要注意用水方法。
en-US: so , pay attention to how you use water when washing your dishes .

zh-CN: 了解身边的回收利用设施。
en-US: find out what the recycling options are in your area .

zh-CN: 然后，确保把纸张、塑料瓶等物品分开以方便回收。
en-US: then make sure you keep items such as paper and plastic bottles separate so that they can be recycled .

zh-CN: 也有回收电器、电池的地方，确保你能找到它们。
en-US: there are places where you can recycle electronic appliances and batteries . make sure you find them .

zh-CN: 使用可再用、可循环、可降解物品。记得使用可再用的购物袋。
en-US: look for reusable , recyclable , biodegradable items and remember to carry your reusable shopping bags !

zh-CN: 每周有一天吃素。
en-US: each week , choose one day when you don't eat meat .

zh-CN: 由于烹饪肉类耗时较长，所以耗能更多。
en-US: meat uses up lots of energy because it takes a long time to produce .

zh-CN: 只买适量的食物，如有剩饭要富有创新精神。
en-US: only buy the amount of food you need and if there are leftovers , get creative .

zh-CN: 例如：将剩菜做成汤。
en-US: for instance , make them into a soup .

zh-CN: 在餐厅吃饭，如有剩饭一定要打包。但切记要适用自己的饭盒，避免用一次性饭盒。
en-US: ask to take food home from restaurants if there's some left , but remember to take your own container to avoid using a disposable carton .

zh-CN: 食品生产耗能巨大。
en-US: food production eats up lots of energy .

zh-CN: 买食品时，请尽量选择当地食品而非进口食品，买新鲜蔬菜而不是冷冻食品。
en-US: when you buy food , go local rather than imported , and get fresh vegetables instead of frozen .

zh-CN: 这是一个离谱的要求：在今后几十年里，世界需要逐步摆脱对化石燃料的依赖，显著减少温室气体。
en-US: it's a tall order : over the next few decades , the world will need to wean itself from dependence on fossil fuels and drastically reduce greenhouse gases .

zh-CN: 目前的技术只能让我们走到这一步了，我们需要拥有重大的技术突破。
en-US: current technology will take us only so far ; major breakthroughs are required .

zh-CN: 这些突破可能是些什么？
en-US: what might those breakthroughs be ?

zh-CN: 本文列出了五项技术，如果成功，它们将会大大改变世界的能源格局。
en-US: here's a look at five technologies that , if successful , could radically change the world energy picture .

zh-CN: 这些技术能带来巨大的机遇。
en-US: they present enormous opportunities .

zh-CN: 例如，从太空获取能量的技术可能迅速催生全新的产业。
en-US: the ability to tap power from space , for instance , could jump-start whole new industries .

zh-CN: 从火电厂捕获和储存二氧化碳的技术可能会令较为老旧的电厂重获新生。
en-US: technology that can trap and store carbon dioxide from coal-fired plants would rejuvenate older ones .

zh-CN: 当然，这些技术并不一定能取得成功。
en-US: success isn't assured , of course .

zh-CN: 它们目前都面临着不少难题，一些技术需要在实验室创造的材料和或转基因植物方面实现一些重大突破。
en-US: the technologies present difficult engineering challenges , and some require big scientific leaps in lab-created materials or genetically modified plants .

zh-CN: 而且，创新的成本不能让能源变得太贵。
en-US: and innovations have to be delivered at a cost that doesn't make energy much more expensive .

zh-CN: 如果能做到这一切，其中任何一项技术都可以改变游戏规则。
en-US: if all of that can be done , any one of these technologies could be a game-changer .

zh-CN: 太空利用太阳能
en-US: space-based solar power

zh-CN: 30多年来，梦想家就一直设想在太阳永远能照耀到的地方──太空中──利用太阳能。
en-US: for more than three decades , visionaries have imagined tapping solar power where the sun always shines -- in space .

zh-CN: 如果我们能在环绕地球的轨道上安置巨大的太阳能电池板，将其中哪怕是一小部分的可用能源传回地球，它们可以向地球上的任何地方提供不间断的电力。
en-US: if we could place giant solar panels in orbit around the earth , and beam even a fraction of the available energy back to earth , they could deliver nonstop electricity to any place on the planet .

zh-CN: 这项技术听起来可能像是科幻小说，但其实很简单：在22,000英里之外的太阳能电池板将能源以微波的形式传回地球，然后转化为电力并进入到电网中。
en-US: the technology may sound like science fiction , but it's simple : solar panels in orbit about 22,000 miles up beam energy in the form of microwaves to earth , where it's turned into electricity and plugged into the grid .

zh-CN: （低能量的光束被认为是安全的。）
en-US: ( the low-powered beams are considered safe. )

zh-CN: 直径1英里的地面接收站可以提供约1,000兆瓦电力，足以供应平均约100万户美国家庭的使用。
en-US: a ground receiving station a mile in diameter could deliver about 1,000 megawatts -- enough to power on average about one million u.s. homes .

zh-CN: 将太阳能收集器送至太空的成本是最大的障碍，因此有必要设计重量足够轻，可以减少发射次数的系统。
en-US: the cost of sending solar collectors into space is the biggest obstacle , so it's necessary to design a system lightweight enough to require only a few launches .

zh-CN: 已经有些国家和公司希望最早在未来10年内提供这种太空电力。
en-US: a handful of countries and companies aim to deliver space-based power as early as a decade from now .

zh-CN: 高级汽车电池
en-US: advanced car batteries

zh-CN: 电动汽车可以降低石油消耗量，有助于空气清洁（如果电力来自于风能和原子能等低碳燃料的话）。
en-US: electrifying vehicles could slash petroleum use and help clean the air ( if electric power shifts to low-carbon fuels like wind or nuclear ) .

zh-CN: 但它需要使用更好的电池。
en-US: but it's going to take better batteries .

zh-CN: 笔记本电脑中常用的锂离子电池是下一代充电式混合动力车和电动车的理想之选。
en-US: lithium-ion batteries , common in laptops , are favored for next-generation plug-in hybrids and electric vehicles .

zh-CN: 它们比其它汽车电池的电力更充足，但也更贵，不过充电后的行驶距离仍不够远；将于明年上市雪佛兰(Chevy)Volt混合动力车凭电池可行驶约40英里。
en-US: they're more powerful than other auto batteries , but they're expensive and still don't go far on a charge ; the chevy volt , a plug-in hybrid coming next year , can run about 40 miles on batteries alone .

zh-CN: 理想情况下，电动车充电一次最好能行驶近400英里。
en-US: ideally , electric cars will get closer to 400 miles on a charge .

zh-CN: 尽管仍有改进的空间，但锂离子电池的潜力有限。
en-US: while improvements are possible , lithium-ion's potential is limited .

zh-CN: 作为一种替代产品，锂空气电池的性能是锂离子电池的10倍，可以提供与汽油同等的能量。
en-US: one alternative , lithium-air , promises 10 times the performance of lithium-ion batteries and could deliver about the same amount of energy , pound for pound , as gasoline .

zh-CN: 锂空气电池从空气中吸收氧气充电，因此这种电池可以更小、更轻。
en-US: a lithium-air battery pulls oxygen from the air for its charge , so the device can be smaller and more lightweight .

zh-CN: 不少实验室都在研究这种技术，但科学家认为，如果没有重大突破，要想实现商用可能还需要10年。
en-US: a handful of labs are working on the technology , but scientists think that without a breakthrough they could be a decade away from commercialization .

zh-CN: 电力储存技术
en-US: utility storage

zh-CN: 所有人都在支持风能和太阳能技术，你怎能置身事外？
en-US: everybody's rooting for wind and solar power . how could you not ?

zh-CN: 但风能和太阳能是那种要么利用要么流失的资源。
en-US: but wind and solar are use-it-or-lose-it resources .

zh-CN: 要改变现状，它们需要更好的储存技术。
en-US: to make any kind of difference , they need better storage .

zh-CN: 科学家正在从诸多角度应对这个问题，但各个方面都面临难题。
en-US: scientists are attacking the problem from a host of angles -- all of which are still problematic .

zh-CN: 举例来说，一项技术是通过风能将地下洞穴内的空气压缩产生电能；将空气输送至燃气涡轮机以提高燃烧功效。
en-US: one , for instance , uses power produced when the wind is blowing to compress air in underground chambers ; the air is fed into gas-fired turbines to make them run more efficiently .

zh-CN: 这其中面临的一个障碍是：要寻找到大空间以及可用的地下洞穴。
en-US: one of the obstacles : finding big , usable , underground caverns .

zh-CN: 类似的，还有能够吸收风能待日后使用的巨型电池，但当前的一些技术成本昂贵，其他技术则不是很有效率。
en-US: similarly , giant batteries can absorb wind energy for later use , but some existing technologies are expensive , and others aren't very efficient .

zh-CN: 尽管研究人员正在寻找新材料以提高性能，但要出现显著技术飞跃的可能性不大。
en-US: while researchers are looking at new materials to improve performance , giant technical leaps aren't likely .

zh-CN: 锂离子技术可能是电网存储前景最好的技术，在这个领域内该技术不会面临像在汽车业中那样多的限制。
en-US: lithium-ion technology may hold the greatest promise for grid storage , where it doesn't have as many limitations as for autos .

zh-CN: 随着性能提高和价格降低，公共事业机构可能会向电网边缘，较为靠近用户的地方输送小体积大容量的锂离子电池。
en-US: as performance improves and prices come down , utilities could distribute small , powerful lithium-ion batteries around the edge of the grid , closer to customers .

zh-CN: 这样，这些锂离子电池可以从可再生能源中存储多余的能源，有助于平抑电能供应的小波动，提高电网的效率，降低对备用火电厂的需求。
en-US: there , they could store excess power from renewables and help smooth small fluctuations in power , making the grid more efficient and reducing the need for backup fossil-fuel plants .

zh-CN: 公用事业机构可以利用汽车电池的研究成果。
en-US: and utilities can piggy-back on research efforts for vehicle batteries .

zh-CN: 碳捕捉和储存技术
en-US: carbon capture and storage

zh-CN: 继续将煤炭作为一种主要的能源意味着需要努力去降低碳燃烧生成的二氧化碳。
en-US: keeping coal as an abundant source of power means slashing the amount of carbon dioxide it produces .

zh-CN: 这可能意味着要建设更高效的新发电厂。
en-US: that could mean new , more efficient power plants .

zh-CN: 但从当前的电厂捕捉二氧化碳（每年大约为20亿吨）可能是一个真正能够改变游戏规则的技术。
en-US: but trapping c02 from existing plants -- about two billion tons a year -- would be the real game-changer .

zh-CN: 目前已经出现了小规模的二氧化碳捕捉技术，但如果将这些技术用于大型发电厂会导致发电量减少三分之一，并导致发电成本增长一倍。
en-US: techniques for modest-scale co2 capture exist , but applying them to big power plants would reduce the plants' output by a third and double the cost of producing power .

zh-CN: 因此，科学家正在寻找既能够将碳排放量降低90%，又能限制成本增长的试验性技术。
en-US: so scientists are looking into experimental technologies that could cut emissions by 90% while limiting cost increases .

zh-CN: 几乎所有技术目前都处于初步阶段，目前断言哪种方法能够最终胜出还为时过早。
en-US: nearly all are in the early stages , and it's too early to tell which method will win out .

zh-CN: 一个前景看好的技术是以金属氧化物的形式燃烧煤炭和纯净氧，而不是在空气中燃烧；这种方法会产生较容易捕捉的二氧化碳集中气流，几乎不会影响电厂的效率。
en-US: one promising technique burns coal and purified oxygen in the form of a metal oxide , rather than air ; this produces an easier-to-capture concentrated stream of co2 with little loss of plant efficiency .

zh-CN: 这种技术已经在小规模试点项目中进行了展示，明年将用于一个装机容量为一百万瓦的试验电厂。
en-US: the technology has been demonstrated in small-scale pilots , and will be tried in a one-megawatt test plant next year .

zh-CN: 但2020年之前，这种技术可能还难以投入商用。
en-US: but it might not be ready for commercial use until 2020 .

zh-CN: 下一代生物燃料
en-US: next-generation biofuels

zh-CN: 一个令我们逐步摆脱对石油依赖的途径就是研制出可再生的运输燃料。
en-US: one way to wean ourselves from oil is to come up with renewable sources of transportation fuel .

zh-CN: 这意味着从非食品作物中研制出新一代的生物燃料。
en-US: that means a new generation of biofuels made from nonfood crops .

zh-CN: 研究人员正在想办法将木材、作物废料、垃圾以及柳枝稷等不可食用植物转化为具有价格优势的燃料。
en-US: researchers are devising ways to turn lumber and crop wastes , garbage and inedible perennials like switchgrass into competitively priced fuels .

zh-CN: 但前景最为看好的新一代生物燃料来自于藻类。
en-US: but the most promising next-generation biofuel comes from algae .

zh-CN: 藻类生长迅速，会消耗二氧化碳，一英亩藻类每年可以生成超过5,000加仑的生物燃料，而一英亩玉米每年只能生产350加仑的乙醇。
en-US: algae grow fast , consume carbon dioxide and can generate more than 5,000 gallons a year per acre of biofuel , compared with 350 gallons a year for corn-based ethanol .

zh-CN: 藻类燃料可以直接添加进当前的提炼和分销系统。
en-US: algae-based fuel can be added directly into existing refining and distribution systems .

zh-CN: 理论上来说，美国可以生产大量的藻类燃料，足以满足美国所有的交通运输需求。
en-US: in theory , the u.s. could produce enough of it to meet all of the nation's transportation needs .

zh-CN: 但现在还为时过早。
en-US: but it's early .

zh-CN: 数十家公司已经开始了试点项目和小规模生产。
en-US: dozens of companies have begun pilot projects and small-scale production .

zh-CN: 但量产藻类燃料意味着要寻找到可靠的、价格低廉的养分和水资源，控制可能导致减产的病原体，研发和培育产量最高的藻株。
en-US: but producing algae biofuels in quantity means finding reliable sources of inexpensive nutrients and water , managing pathogens that could reduce yield , and developing and cultivating the most productive algae strains .

zh-CN: 在约一万年前的更新世，大象和猛犸象从地球上许多地区大量消失。一项新研究表明，导致这场灭绝的并不是气候剧变，而是饥饿的史前猎人。
en-US: hungry prehistoric hunters , not climate change , drove elephants and wooly mammoths to extinction during the pleistocene era , new research suggests .

zh-CN: 一只股票因企业盈利表现一般而下滑——季度利润只有70亿美元。另一只股票则因一笔将会损害公司利润的交易而上涨3%。
en-US: one slips on so-so earnings – only $7bn in quarterly profits. the other jumps 3 per cent on a deal that will hurt its bottom line .

zh-CN: 不难看出，后者——联想比三星电子的市场势头更强劲。
en-US: it isn ’ t hard to see that the latter , lenovo , has more market momentum than samsung electronics .

zh-CN: 从联想的新服务器业务，到三星的芯片业务，两家公司都生产消费者电子产品和科技硬件。
en-US: both make consumer electronics and tech hardware , from lenovo’s new server business to samsung ’ s chips .

zh-CN: 联想会成为下一个三星吗？
en-US: might lenovo become the next samsung ?

zh-CN: 从规模上看，这样的比较仍有些可笑。
en-US: on a size basis , the comparison is still a bit ridiculous .

zh-CN: 三星的市值是1600亿美元；联想则是140亿美元。
en-US: samsung ’ s market capitalisation is $160 bn ; lenovo’s , $14bn .

zh-CN: 三星在最近一个季度的利润是联想过去一年利润的10倍。
en-US: samsung ’ s profits last quarter were 10 times lenovo’s for the past year .

zh-CN: 不过，联想近日收购IBMx86服务器业务的交易表明，它仍具备其2004年收购“蓝色巨人”个人电脑业务时所展现的雄心壮志。
en-US: still , lenovo’s deal this week to buy ibm ’ s x86 server business demonstrates that it still has the ambition it showed when it bought big blue ’ s pc business in 2004 .

zh-CN: 相对低廉的收购价格（相当于销售额的一半），反映了IBM该项业务去年陷入亏损。
en-US: the relatively low price paid – half of sales – reflects the ibm unit ’ s swing into loss last year .

zh-CN: 该业务将令联想的全年每股盈利削减5%，包括向IBM发行股票后造成的轻微稀释。
en-US: the business will knock about 5 per cent off lenovo’s full-year earnings per share , including the slight dilution from the shares issued to ibm .

zh-CN: 股价上涨表明，投资者认为联想能以相对较低的成本结构来提高利润。
en-US: the shares’ rise suggests that investors think it can use its lower cost structure to lift profits .

zh-CN: 投资者喜欢大胆的科技企业故事。
en-US: investors like bold tech stories .

zh-CN: 三星的成功也并非来自怯懦。
en-US: samsung ’ s success was not born of timidity either .

zh-CN: 它从没有像联想那样通过收购来实现增长，但它曾冒风险向价值链上游转移。
en-US: it has never bought in growth as lenovo has , but has taken risks to move up the value chain .

zh-CN: 三星在最近一个季度意料之外的利润下滑，其中一个原因是它向员工支付了8000亿韩元（合7.38亿美元）的奖金，以庆祝其20年前实施的一项战略。
en-US: one of the reasons for its unexpectedly poor earnings in the latest quarter was a won800bn ( $ 738m ) bonus paid to employees to mark the 20 th anniversary of a strategy .

zh-CN: 当时三星主席将15万部手机（总值5000万美元）付之一炬，以此表达他期望打造更好产品的决心。
en-US: back then its chairman made a bonfire of 150,000 mobile phones – worth $50m – to make the point he wanted better .

zh-CN: 现在三星正试图打入软件领域——对一家由硬件工程师组成的公司来说是个挑战。
en-US: now samsung is trying to push into software – a challenge for a company staffed by hardware engineers .

zh-CN: 过去20年里，三星股价年均复合上涨20%。
en-US: samsung ’ s shares have risen 20 per cent a year , compounded , for the past two decades .

zh-CN: 联想若能实现同样的成就，它将需要10年多一点的时间达到三星目前的规模。
en-US: should lenovo follow suit , it will take it a little over a decade to reach samsung ’ s present size .

zh-CN: 势头对联想有利。
en-US: lenovo has momentum on its side .

zh-CN: 但它能否以低成本制造平价商品化的硬件为基础，维持利润增长？
en-US: but can it sustain profit growth on a foundation of low-cost manufacture of commodity hardware ?

zh-CN: 三星通过大举投资，获得了芯片领域的持久竞争优势——规模，在此基础上建立了一个利润丰厚的高端手机业务。
en-US: samsung invested aggressively to acquire an enduring competitive advantage – scale – in chips , and from there built a hugely profitable premium phone business .

zh-CN: 联想需要找到类似的竞争优势。
en-US: lenovo needs to find a similar edge .

zh-CN: 把销售增长和成本削减相结合，不是什么新点子。
en-US: combining sales growth with cost cutting is not an innovative idea .

zh-CN: 不过，当中国零售商开始这么做的时候，它们正不可思议地回归理智。
en-US: it represents , nonetheless , a shocking return to sanity in chinese retailing .

zh-CN: 国美电器(Gome)在宣布利润上升后，股价开盘跳升9%，表明该公司做出的简单改进能带来多大的改变。
en-US: the 9 per cent opening pop in gome’s shares after it raised its profits shows the importance of the simple improvements the company has made .

zh-CN: 去年，国美处于亏损状态。
en-US: last year gome was lossmaking .

zh-CN: 它卷入了一场对中国网上家电市场的恶性争夺中。在中国，家电是仅次于服装的第二大电子商务市场。
en-US: it became caught in a vicious online battle for market share in china ’ s electrical appliances market , the largest ecommerce sector after clothes .

zh-CN: 在国美之前，纯电商京东商城(360Buy)等竞争对手承诺三年内零毛利，还使出了一些其他市场干扰手段。
en-US: rivals such as 360 buy , a purely online operator , had pledged zero gross margins for three years and other disrupting tactics .

zh-CN: 随着政府补贴到期，国内销售也开始放缓。
en-US: slowing sales that followed the expiry of some government subsidies hurt , too .

zh-CN: 但国美本周宣布，2013年第四季度，其可比门店销售收入增长预期将超过15%，高于全年增幅，2013年综合毛利率预计将超过18%——再次达到三年前水平的一半。
en-US: yet this week gome talked of same-store sales growing by 15 per cent ( above overall retail sales ) and an 18 per cent gross margin – half as much again as the level of three years ago .

zh-CN: 虽然这个水平仍然落后于美国百思买(BestBuy)、日本山田电机(YamadaDenki)的23%和欧洲Darty集团的32%，但通过削减成本这类简单策略，业绩改善效果仍然惊人。
en-US: granted , that still lags behind the likes of best buy in the us , japan ’ s yamada denki ( 23 per cent ) and europe ’ s darty group ( 32 per cent ) , but the size of the improvement delivered by a tactic as basic as cost-cutting is impressive .

zh-CN: 国美还有更大改善空间。2013年上半年，它成功将库存周转天数降到56天，同比减少了18天。
en-US: more gains are possible. consider inventory turnover , where gome managed to cut its cycle by 14 days to 56 in the first half of 2013 .

zh-CN: 当时国美表示，它认为未来两年还可以再减掉8天。
en-US: it said then it thought there were another eight days it could trim over the next two years .

zh-CN: 国美把注意力放在了对门店网络更好地布局上，而且此举正在见到成效：实体店数量减少之余，销售额却升上去了。
en-US: the company has focused on better positioning its store network and it is working : the rising sales have come on the back of less bricks-and-mortar space .

zh-CN: 中国零售业真正的扩张将发生在互联网上。据花旗(Citi)估计，一直到2018年，中国线上零售额可能以每年25%的速度增长。
en-US: the real expansion in chinese retail will be online , where sales could rise a quarter each year to 2018 , citi estimates .

zh-CN: 国美仍须思考如何从线上运营中赚钱。
en-US: gome still has to figure out how to make money from its online operations .

zh-CN: 但同时，不要忽略国美的成就——放弃一场灾难性的网络市场份额争夺战，实实在在地改善实体店业绩。
en-US: but in the meantime , do not ignore its achievement in swapping a disastrous online market share battle for a steady approach to bricks and mortar .

zh-CN: 奚国华用不着排队就得到了一台iPhone。
en-US: xi guohua will not have to join any queues to get his iphone .

zh-CN: 这位中国移动董事长刚得到苹果首席执行官蒂姆•库克送的一部iPhone。
en-US: the china mobile chairman was given one by apple chief tim cook .

zh-CN: 本周五，中国移动版iPhone正式发售，而该公司用户总数是惊人的7.5亿。
en-US: friday sees the launch of the iphone on the chinese network , with its mind-boggling 750 m subscriber base .

zh-CN: 不过，iPhone在世界最大的市场迎来激动人心的时刻之际，正是本土竞争加剧之时。
en-US: but the iphone’s moment in the world ’ s biggest market comes just as the local competition is gearing up .

zh-CN: 如果连高端智能手机的利润率都会下降的话——就像苹果和三星的利润率所体现的那样，那么像华为、联想和小米这样的生产商，又该作何感想呢？
en-US: if , as apple ’ s ( and samsung ’ s ) margins suggest , even high-end smartphones are becoming less profitable , what are the likes of huawei , lenovo and xiaomi thinking ?

zh-CN: 2014年，中国十大手机制造商预计总共将销售手机逾4亿部，比2013年增长50%。
en-US: combined , china ’ s top 10 makers expect to shift more than 400 m phones this year , a 50 per cent increase on 2013 .

zh-CN: 据瑞信预测，中国今年的智能手机销量将达到约4.4亿部，同比增长25%。
en-US: about 440 m smartphones will be sold in china in 2014 , according to credit suisse – a 25 per cent jump .

zh-CN: 其中苹果、三星和其他第一梯队制造商会占据一些份额，意味着中国本土品牌也必须瞄准其他新兴市场，这些市场的手机销量预计将增加三分之一，达到4.7亿部。中国制造商往往有生产高端手机的抱负，但它们赖以为生的却是在新兴市场占主导地位的低端和中端产品。
en-US: that includes apple , samsung and other top-tier makers , implying the home brands must also be aiming for other emerging markets , where sales are expected to rise a third , to 470m chinese makers often have high-end ambitions , but their bread and butter is in the low- and mid-range phones that rule emerging markets .

zh-CN: 庞大的需求是一回事，赚钱是另一回事。
en-US: plentiful demand is one thing , making money is another .

zh-CN: 苹果和三星的盈利法宝是利用规模和品牌来削减成本，并让消费者为其产品付尽可能高的价钱。
en-US: apple and samsung profit from using their scale and brands to cut costs and demand top dollar .

zh-CN: 低端手机的成本低得多。
en-US: low-end phones cost far less to make .

zh-CN: 瑞信估计，生产一部4.7英寸、品牌一般的手机，最低只需94美元。相比之下，三星GalaxyS4的生产成本是266美元。
en-US: the cost of producing a so-so brand 4.7 ’ ’ screen phone could be as low as $94 , credit suisse reckons , compared with $266 for samsung ’ s galaxy s4.

zh-CN: 而三星这款热卖机的售价是554美元，前面那款便宜机仅售122美元。
en-US: but that cheap phone sells for $122 , versus $554 for samsung ’ s smash hit .

zh-CN: 二者毛利相差10倍。
en-US: that is a 10 times difference in gross profit .

zh-CN: 当然，产品大众化会挤压三星和苹果的利润，但并不会完全使其丧失定价能力。
en-US: sure , commoditisation will squeeze samsung and apple , but it will not entirely kill their pricing power .

zh-CN: 既然消费者会乐于为香烟和品牌饮用水支付高价，一个强大的手机品牌的价值也就不难明白。
en-US: if consumers happily pay premiums for cigarettes and branded water , it is not hard to see value in a strong phone brand .

zh-CN: 中国制造商可以通过建立竞争性品牌来挑战三星和苹果——但请向宏达电(HTC)请教这样做的风险。
en-US: chinese makers could try taking on samsung and apple by building rival brands – but ask htc about the risks in that .

zh-CN: 今年的出货量继续大增，表明这些制造商宁愿追求规模，以便挤压供应商，榨取更多利润。
en-US: the jump in this year ’ s shipments implies they are instead seeking scale in order to squeeze suppliers and grind out profits .

zh-CN: 这是个更好的计划，但也不会让它们赚很多。
en-US: it is the better plan , but it will not make much money , either .

zh-CN: 对一款视频游戏机而言，“TRON”是个很酷（也许还有点吓人）的名字。
en-US: ‘ tron ’ is a cool , if slightly scary , name for a video-game console .

zh-CN: 它还是一部1982年拍摄的迪斯尼电影的名字——这部电影中的主人公陷于一个虚拟世界而无法脱身。
en-US: it is also a 1982 disney film about being trapped in a virtual world .

zh-CN: 但这并没有阻止华为(Huawei)在2014年于中国国内市场推出了以这个名字命名的游戏设备。
en-US: this has not stopped huawei from launching a gaming device by that name in china , its home market , in 2014 .

zh-CN: 然而，对于这家由前军队工程师创立、员工持股、雄心勃勃的未上市公司来说，电信设备是一项规模大得多的业务，电信行业中其他大公司的投资者们，正越来越多地陷入了这个由华为主导的世界。
en-US: telecoms equipment is , however , a much larger business for this ambitious , unlisted , employee-owned company , founded by an ex-military engineer . investors in the sector ’ s other big players are , increasingly , trapped in huawei ’ s world .

zh-CN: 在廉价智能手机销量不断增长的带动下，华为正在撼动新兴市场的消费电子产品市场，在这种背景下推出廉价游戏机将有助于华为的品牌建设。
en-US: cheap consoles will help build huawei ’ s brand now that it is shaking up consumer electronics in emerging markets , led by increasing sales of cheap smartphones .

zh-CN: 华为上周曾表示，今年智能手机的目标出货量为8000万台——比去年实际出货量增长3000万台。
en-US: revealing its 2013 results on tuesday , the company said it planned to shift 80 m units this year – 30 m more than last year .

zh-CN: 华为周三宣布全年业绩时称，2013年销售收入达约400亿美元，比上年有强劲增长，同时其运营商网络业务超过75%的收入来自全球排名前50的电信运营商。
en-US: selling kit to carrier networks still accounted for three-quarters or so of its $40 bn in revenues last year , growing decently from 2012 levels .

zh-CN: 这应该让思科(Cisco)、阿尔卡特-朗讯(Alcatel-Lucent)或爱立信(Ericsson)的投资者感到害怕，原因有二。
en-US: that should spook investors in cisco , alcatel-lucent or ericsson – for two reasons .

zh-CN: 首先，临近2013年底，几个新兴市场中，所有冲击到思科业务的因素都没有影响到华为。
en-US: first , whatever it was that battered cisco’s business in several emerging markets towards the end of 2013 , it did no harm to huawei .

zh-CN: 美国间谍机构通过私人设备从事窃听活动被曝光之后，潜在顾客可能对思科心存疑虑，而这些顾客对中国通过华为产品开展窥探行为却没有西方政客那样担心。
en-US: potential cisco customers might be put off by the revelations about us spies snooping via private hardware and be less worried than western politicians about china peeking down huawei ’ s wires .

zh-CN: 不过，更大的可能是，随着新兴市场巨大商机（即向4G平台转移）的出现，华为将在新兴市场完败西方企业。
en-US: but it is more likely that huawei is simply beating the western companies in emerging markets , just as big opportunities there ( the transition to 4g ) come up for grabs .

zh-CN: 华为为营收设定的目标是，到2017年前每年增长10%。
en-US: huawei ’ s target for dollar revenue growth is 10 per cent per year to 2017 .

zh-CN: 爱立信认为电信设备市场的增长率在3%到5%之间。
en-US: ericsson sees the equipment market growing at 3 per cent to 5 per cent .

zh-CN: 这意味着华为将在该市场中争取更大份额。
en-US: this suggests huawei will take more share .

zh-CN: 不过华为并未详细说明将靠哪些部门实现这一增长，也没有透露太多有关其目前或将来资金来源的信息。
en-US: but huawei does not detail which divisions will provide the growth . nor does it say much about where its capital has , or will , come from .

zh-CN: 而有关员工持股或未来发债的问题（该公司三年前曾在香港发行1.5亿美元的债券），该公司也说得很少。
en-US: information about employees ’ share ownership or future bond issues ( it sold $150 m in debt in hong kong three years ago ) is scant .

zh-CN: 因此，很难判断华为的扩张能不能维持下去。
en-US: it is hard to know , therefore , whether huawei ’ s expansion is sustainable or not .

zh-CN: 在开发车载信息系统的角逐中，谷歌公司(GoogleInc.)可能会成为赢家，原因很简单：谷歌拥有地图这个杀手锏。
en-US: in the race to build in-car information systems , google may be destined for the checkered flag for one simple reason : it has the killer map .

zh-CN: 在上周举行的国际消费电子展上，谷歌和通用汽车等汽车企业宣布成立开放汽车联盟。
en-US: at the international ces show last week , google and several car makers , including general motors , launched the open automotive alliance .

zh-CN: 计划把谷歌的安卓操作系统打造成联网汽车的应用公共平台。
en-US: this is a plan to establish google's android operating system as a common platform for apps in the connected car .

zh-CN: 至此，谷歌与苹果公司(Apple)和微软(Microsoft)之间的竞争进入了一个新的领域。苹果去年宣布计划将其产品集成到汽车仪表盘内，而微软也与福特汽车(FordMotor)合作开发车载语音控制和触屏技术。
en-US: that opens a new front in google's battle with apple , which announced plans last year to integrate its devices into car makers' dashboard control panels , and microsoft , which developed in-car voice-activated and touch-screen technologies with ford motor .

zh-CN: 与竞争对手早已行动相比，谷歌可能起步较晚。
en-US: given rivals' earlier moves , google could be seen as having a late start .

zh-CN: 不过，安卓系统的开放性具有明显的吸引力。
en-US: but the open nature of android has obvious appeal .

zh-CN: 由于企业可以对安卓系统自定义处理，这一点甚至让谷歌的竞争对手也使用该系统；比如亚马逊(Amazon.com)，该公司就在其Kindle阅读器中推出了自己的定制版安卓系统。
en-US: the ability for a company to customize android persuades even google's rivals to use it ; amazon.com , for example , tweaked the software for its own kindle reading device .

zh-CN: 鉴于汽车的开发周期很长，这方面是一个企业需要考虑的重要因素。
en-US: given vehicle development's long lead times , these are important considerations .

zh-CN: 更为重要的或许是谷歌在地图方面的经验。
en-US: more important may be google's map expertise .

zh-CN: 谷歌在全球各地派出取景车提供街景(StreetView)服务，其地图的精确度和更新速度为其他竞争对手难以企及。
en-US: having sent cars with cameras all over the world to develop its street view capabilities , the company has created maps that are extremely accurate and up to date where others aren't .

zh-CN: 在这一方面，不难联想到苹果2012年为自己的地图应用向用户道歉一事，当时该公司尝试推出自己的新版地图应用以替代谷歌地图，但并没有获得用户认可。
en-US: think of the apology apple had to issue in 2012 following criticism of a new version of its own maps app , which was designed to replace google's .

zh-CN: 谷歌地图在搭载安卓和苹果iOS操作系统的设备上的受欢迎程度产生了网络效应。
en-US: the popularity of google's maps for devices running android and apple's ios creates a network effect .

zh-CN: 使用谷歌地图的人越多，谷歌获取的交通等信息就越丰富，其地图服务的吸引力就越大。
en-US: the more people who use google maps , the more information google has on factors such as traffic , and the more appealing the product becomes .

zh-CN: 这也是谷歌去年收购实时交通信息应用Waze的思路所在。
en-US: such was the logic behind google's purchase of waze , a real-time traffic-information app , last year .

zh-CN: 此外，谷歌之所以对地图服务感兴趣，一个不容忽视的重要原因是其自动驾驶汽车项目。
en-US: and don't forget a big reason for google's interest in cartography is its autonomous vehicle program .

zh-CN: 系统崩溃对汽车的意义与智能手机完全不同。
en-US: a crash means something quite different for a car compared with a smartphone .

zh-CN: 就自动驾驶汽车而言，无论从监管角度还是产品可靠性角度来看，要想把可能出现的错误降到最小程度，精确的地图不可或缺。
en-US: to minimize the potential for error , a must from both a regulatory and product-liability standpoint , a self-driving car needs a painstakingly accurate map .

zh-CN: 许多公司都在此次消费电子展上展示了全自动和半自动汽车驾驶技术，而这也可能成为本周底特律汽车展上的一大热点，由此看来，美国公路上出现商用自动驾驶汽车似乎已不再是不切实际的空想，而越来越成为指日可待的现实。
en-US: with a gaggle of companies demonstrating autonomous and semiautonomous vehicle technology at ces , and likely at this week's auto show in detroit , the day when commercially available self-driving cars cruise u.s. roads looks less a futurist daydream and more a rapidly approaching reality .

zh-CN: 摩根士丹利在最近的报告中表示，美国人一年驾驶汽车的时间为750亿小时，自动驾驶汽车对整个社会产生的影响要比多数人预期的大得多。
en-US: ' with u.s. drivers driving 75 billion hours a year , autonomous cars are also poised to have a much greater impact on society as a whole than most people give them credit for , ' morgan stanley said in a recent report .

zh-CN: 谷个的自动驾驶汽车项目也是汽车业如此重视这一概念的重要原因。
en-US: google's autonomous-car program is a big reason the concept is being taken so seriously within the automotive industry .

zh-CN: 不难想像，未来会有一天谷歌向汽车企业提供自动驾驶技术的授权许可，就像现在其向智能手机制造商提供安卓系统授权许可一样。
en-US: it isn't hard to envision the company licensing the technology for car makers just as right now it provides its android operating system to smartphone manufacturers .

zh-CN: 至少，汽车企业可能希望在自己的程序中使用谷歌地图技术。
en-US: at the least , car companies may want to tap google's map technology for their programs .

zh-CN: 不过，鉴于谷歌的产品种类较广，汽车企业与谷歌建立更紧密的长期合作关系可能符合这些厂商的最大利益。
en-US: but google's wider product offering means they may see it as being in their best interest to build a closer relationship with it over the long term .

zh-CN: 综上所述，随着汽车自动驾驶时代来临、汽车企业和驾驶员尝试这一陌生领域，谷歌相比苹果等公司具有更大优势。
en-US: all of which gives google an advantage over the likes of apple as the autonomous age arrives and detroit and drivers venture into unfamiliar territory without a map .

zh-CN: 与中资公司存在纠纷的美国投资者有了一个新的法律工具，目前这个工具的使用范围正在扩大。
en-US: a new legal tool for u.s. investors who are locked in disputes with chinese companies is being put to wider use .

zh-CN: 特拉华州衡平法院一位法官于1月6日授予中国英利普科技（深圳）有限公司的投资者一项权利，使他们能够将所持股票回售给该公司，此前这些投资者尝试获得该公司财务报表信息的努力未获成功。
en-US: a delaware chancery court judge on jan. 6 awarded investors who had tried unsuccessfully to gain access to the books of china's yinlips technology inc. the ability to sell their shares back to the company .

zh-CN: 这家法院还聘请一位接管人来接管该公司资产，以完成这些交易。
en-US: it also appointed a receiver to seize the company's assets to fulfill the transaction .

zh-CN: 电子公司英利普科技未回复记者寻求置评的请求。
en-US: yinlips , an electronics company , didn't respond to a request for comment .

zh-CN: 去年也有一起类似案件，当时特拉华州衡平法院的另一位法官授予了另一家中资公司的投资者类似的权利。
en-US: the ruling builds on a similar case last year , when another judge in delaware chancery court granted essentially the same remedy to investors of a different chinese company .

zh-CN: 这两起案子为类似的美国投资者提供了一个反击的方式，他们此前因为这些中资公司的股票受会计和披露等问题下跌而蒙受损失。
en-US: together , the two cases are providing investors with a way to strike back at chinese companies that cost investors money when their stocks drop because of alleged accounting or disclosure problems .

zh-CN: 纽约律师事务所AndersonKill的律师格拉夫是这两起案件中投资者的代理律师，他说，他认为至少还有六起针对中资公司的诉讼案会采用这种方式。
en-US: david graff , a lawyer at the new york law firm of anderson kill who represents the investors in both cases , said he was aware of at least six other pending court cases against chinese companies in which such a remedy could come into play .

zh-CN: 英利普科技于2008年通过面向投资者的私人配售进入美国市场，格拉夫在一次采访中说，这家公司骗走了投资者的资金。
en-US: yinlips entered the u.s. in 2008 via a private placement of stock to investors , and mr. graff alleged in an interview that it 'absconded with the investor funds . '

zh-CN: 英利普科技此前在提交美国政府的文件中说，计划在美国市场上市交易。
en-US: yinlips said in u.s. government filings that it planned to trade on u.s. markets .

zh-CN: 去年7月份美国证券交易委员会将该公司股票从注册名单中除名，因为此前该公司未能按要求提交年度和季度报表。
en-US: but the securities and exchange commission revoked the u.s. registration of the company's securities last july after yinlips failed to file required annual and quarterly reports .

zh-CN: 在私人配售中购买了英利普科技总计150万股股票的四位投资者此前对该公司提起诉讼，以期迫使该公司向他们公开财务报表。
en-US: four investors who bought a total of 1.5 million yinlips shares in the private placement sued to force the company to open its books to them .

zh-CN: 特拉华州衡平法院副大法官帕森斯在去年10月份做出了支持这些投资者的裁决。
en-US: chancery court vice chancellor donald f. parsons jr. ruled in their favor last october .

zh-CN: 格拉夫在上周一次庭审中说，英利普科技无视法院裁决，并且曾在这些投资者的代表前来通知诉讼信息时将他们“强行赶出”其办公室。
en-US: mr. graff said in a court hearing last week that yinlips ignored the ruling and that at one point the company 'forcibly removed' the investors' representatives from its offices when they informed it of the litigation .

zh-CN: 法官帕森斯判定英利普科技藐视法庭，称其行为极端恶劣，并且不守信用。
en-US: the judge found yinlips in contempt , calling its conduct egregious and saying it had 'acted in bad faith . '

zh-CN: 他授予投资者一项出售选择权，强制英利普科技按公平市值购回这些投资者手中的股票，将于2月末或3月初举行的一次庭审将确定这一公平市值。
en-US: he awarded the investors a put option to force yinlips to buy back their shares at fair-market value , which will be determined at a court hearing to be held in late february or early march .

zh-CN: 据裁决文件显示，帕森斯还聘请一位接管人协助执行这一裁决，给予其接管、买卖或者处置该公司在美国、中国或者其他地区任何资产的权利。
en-US: mr. parsons also appointed a receiver to help satisfy the judgment , with the authority 'to seize , deal in or dispose of any property of the company' in the u.s. , china or elsewhere , according to the ruling .

zh-CN: 帕森斯在裁决书中引用了此前一起案例，去年3月份另一位法官给予投资者多伊奇强制网络设备制造商神阳科技有限公司以高于市价的价格（总额超过3,200万美元）购回他所持股票的权利，并聘请了一位接管人通过接管和出售神阳科技资产来执行这一裁决。
en-US: in his ruling , mr. parsons cited the earlier case , in which a different judge ruled last march that investor peter deutsch was entitled to force network-equipment maker zst digital networks inc. to buy back his zst shares for above-market prices totaling more than $32 million and to have the receiver seize and sell zst assets to satisfy the judgment .

zh-CN: 神阳科技未回复记者寻求置评的请求。
en-US: zst didn't respond to a request for comment .

zh-CN: 接管中资公司在美国以外地区的资产颇具挑战，但这位接管人已表示，他已经冻结了神阳科技的银行账户并且控制了其部分子公司。去年8月份，神阳科技表示，愿意就多伊奇的指控通过协商达成和解。
en-US: it can be challenging to go after a chinese company's assets held outside the u.s. , but the receiver has said he has seized zst bank accounts and control over some of its subsidiaries , and in august zst indicated it was open to discussing a settlement of mr. deutsch's claims .

zh-CN: 格拉夫拒绝就神阳科技的和解协商情况置评。
en-US: mr. graff declined to comment on the status of any zst settlement discussions .

zh-CN: （8）微博测试集。
en-US: ( 8 ) twitter test data .

zh-CN: 凉风忽起的时候，总会有人把房间的门窗悄悄地关上。
en-US: when suddenly from the cool breeze , there is always someone put the room quietly shut the doors and windows .

zh-CN: 些似小非小，看轻非轻的点点滴滴却都源于一个不变的心念，那就是亲情。
en-US: these seem small non-small , underestimate the importance of non-light none originated from a constant mind , it is affection .

zh-CN: 无论是国王还是农夫，家庭和睦是最幸福的。(德国剧作家、诗人歌德.J.W.)
en-US: he is the happiest , be he king or peasant , who finds peace in his home. ( johann wolfgang von goethe , german dramatist and poet )

zh-CN: 人生不是要按别人的想法去过，而是要跟随内心，做自己想做的那个人。
en-US: your life is not about what people expect you to be . it's about following your heart to be what you want to be .

zh-CN: 微笑，不是因为快乐太久，是太久的时间里忘记去悲伤。
en-US: smiling , not because happiness too long , is too long time forgot to sorrow .

zh-CN: 有时候，我们做过的最艰难的选择，最终成了我们为自己做过的最棒的事。
en-US: sometimes the hardest choices we make end up being the best thing we could have ever done for ourselves .

zh-CN: 假如你的寿命是100年，那我希望自己活到100岁的前一天，因为那样我的生命中每天都有你。
en-US: if you live to be 100 years old , i hope i live to be 100 minus 1 day , so i never have to live without you .

zh-CN: 新年是给我们一个新的机会去原谅，去进步，去给予更多，去爱得更多。
en-US: new year is about getting another chance . a chance to forgive , to do better , to give more , to love more .

zh-CN: 不要让不切实际的期盼，毁掉了已经拥有的简单幸福，很多重要时刻都是悄然而至的。
en-US: don't let unrealistic expectations ruin the simple beauty of the reality. some great moments arrive quietly .

zh-CN: 就算只有自己的影子陪伴，也不要忘记对自己微笑。
en-US: even though you only have the shadow of yourself with you , don't forget to smile to yourself .

zh-CN: 没有人可以和生活讨价还价，所以只要活着，就一定要努力。
en-US: no one can bargain with life. you must endeavor as long as you are alive .

zh-CN: 不要后悔。如果好，那很棒；如果不好，那就当一段经历吧。
en-US: never regret . if it ’ s good , it ’ s wonderful. if it ’ s bad , it ’ s experience .

zh-CN: 做过的事无法挽回，说过的话难以收回。该从过去走出来了，要为更好的未来而努力。
en-US: what ’ s done is done , what ’ s said is said. time to move on from the past and work on a better future .

zh-CN: 如果我们有勇气去追求，我们所有的梦想都可以成为现实。
en-US: all our dreams can come true ， if we have the courage to pursue them .

zh-CN: 生活，就该有些阳光，有点自由，还有一些花朵。
en-US: just living is not enough. one must have sunshine , freedom , and a little flower .

zh-CN: 无论你正在经历着什么，有人和你分享总是好的。
en-US: no matter what you ' re going through , it's always better if you have people to share it with .

zh-CN: 永远记得成功的秘诀是热情。永远要志存高远并且分享你的爱和快乐。这样，你将拥有一个快乐的未来。
en-US: always remember that the secret of success is passion. always think big. spread love & joy. you'll have blissful years ahead .

zh-CN: 别想倒带，这是生活，不是电影！
en-US: stop trying to find a rewind. it's life , not a movie .

zh-CN: 没有期望，也就不会失望。
en-US: live without expectations , and you won ’t be disappointed .

zh-CN: 不必为你无法控制的事情而担心。
en-US: you won ’ t have to worry about things you can ’ t control .

zh-CN: 坦然面对和接受事实。
en-US: you will just flow and accept things as they are .

zh-CN: 迷失了自己一次，是为了让自己以后更好认清前方的路。
en-US: lost themselves once ， is to make yourself better recognizing the path ahead after ．

zh-CN: 生中无论快乐与悲伤，最后都将成为回忆。
en-US: whether it is happiness or sorrow , it would finally become memories of life .

zh-CN: 感受梦的火焰，感觉飞舞瞬间，当一切浪漫遥远，永恒依然。
en-US: to feel the flame of dreaming and to feel the moment of dancing , when all the romance is far away , the eternity is always there 。

zh-CN: 很多人之间都不需要再见，因为我们只在无意间擦肩而过。忘却是留给彼此最好的纪念。
en-US: many people do not need good-bye , because of just going by . forget is that we give each other the best souvenir .

zh-CN: 欲望总是让我们不满足，想要拥有更多，却不知拥有就是失去的开始。
en-US: desires just leave us unsatisfied and wanting more , without being aware that having is just the beginning of losing .

zh-CN: 爱就像一阵风，虽然看不到，但却能感觉得到。
en-US: love is like the wind , i can't see it , but i can feel it .

zh-CN: 你能给一个人最好的礼物，就是你的时间，你的关注，你的爱和你的关心。
en-US: the greatest gift you can give someone is your time , your attention , your love , your concern .

zh-CN: 真实生活，无需伪装；真心去爱，不要依赖；认真倾听，莫要设防；谦和说话，切勿攻击。
en-US: live without pretending ; love without depending ; listen without defending ; speak without offending .

zh-CN: 曾经输掉的东西，只要你想，就一定可以再一点一点赢回来。
en-US: all that you have lost can be won back bit by bit as long as you wish for it .

zh-CN: 爱，不是因为你找到一个完美的人，而是因为一个不完美的人在你的眼中变得完美。
en-US: you come to love not by finding the perfect person , but by seeing an imperfect person perfectly .

zh-CN: 真正的爱情需要等待，谁都可以说爱你，但不是人人都能等你。
en-US: true love needs you to wait for it. everybody can say that he loves you but not each of them can wait for you .

zh-CN: 我想要的并不是一段完美的恋情。我只想有个人和我一起2，对我好，喜欢和我呆在一起。
en-US: i don't want a perfect relationship. i just want someone who i can act silly with , someone who treats me well and loves being with me .

zh-CN: 不是不追求,只是不去强求。淡然地过着自己的生活，不要轰轰烈烈，只求安安心心。
en-US: pursue not just don't go not importune.and calmly of my life. not grandeur but philosophically assured .

zh-CN: 成功时，我们的朋友认识了我们；不幸时，我们了解了我们的朋友。
en-US: in prosperity our friends know us ; in uadversity we know friends .

zh-CN: 明天常常是一周中最忙碌的一天。梦想不应等待，也经不起等待。我们必须马上行动。
en-US: tomorrow is often the busiest day of the week. our dreams should not , and cannot wait. we have to go for them now !

zh-CN: 你不会理解当我们彼此沉默时我的那种失落。
en-US: you can't understand , when we keep silence , i feel lost .

zh-CN: 当你真的在乎一个人，多么微不足道的小细节，也变得重要起来。
en-US: when you really care about a person , even such little thing would become important .

zh-CN: 每一天都是一个崭新的开始，当如此对待。不要再纠结于过去，想想现在能做点什么吧。
en-US: every day is a new beginning. treat it that way. stay away from what might have been , and look at what can be .

zh-CN: 爱不是什么可能、大概、也许，一旦爱上了，自己是十分清楚的。
en-US: love is not a maybe thing. you know when you love someone .

zh-CN: 生命中最美好的事物都是免费的，次美好的事物都很贵。

en-US: both happiness and sadness in our life would fade away with time .

zh-CN: 如果每天不学点新的东西，就是在浪费生命。
en-US: if you are not learning something new every day , you are wasting away days of your life .

zh-CN: 爬上山顶并不是为了让全世界看到你，而是让你看到整个世界。
en-US: climb mountains not so the world can see you , but so you can see the world .

zh-CN: 勇气就是虽感恐惧，但仍会前行。
en-US: courage is being afraid but going on anyhow .

zh-CN: 该发生的总会发生，不管你是否为此焦虑。
en-US: whatever is going to happen will happen , whether we worry or not .

zh-CN: 有时候我们不得不流完所有的眼泪，才能腾出地方给一颗充满微笑的心。
en-US: sometimes people have to cry out all their tears , to make room for a heart full of smiles .

zh-CN: 有时候我们不得不流完所有的眼泪，才能腾出地方给一颗充满微笑的心。
en-US: sometimes people have to cry out all their tears , to make room for a heart full of smiles .

zh-CN: 一个人有一个人的自由,两个人有两个人的甜蜜。
en-US: a person who has a free , two people have two person's sweet .

en-US: if you don't have any shadows , you ' re not in the light .

zh-CN: 我们不能控制风向，但我们可以调整自己的帆。
en-US: we cannot direct the wind , but we can adjust the sails .

zh-CN: 人生路漫长，有些路只有坚持走下去，才能看到它最真实的美丽。
en-US: life long , some road only stick to it , to see it the most beautiful real .

zh-CN: 微笑吧，因为你笑起来很美丽；保持坚强吧，因为这样谁都不可以打倒你！
en-US: smile , because you ’ re beautiful while you are smiling ; keep strong , because haters can't bring you down .

en-US: knowing what you can not do is more important than knowing what you can do .

en-US: act like i don ’ t care , but inside , i care more than you can think .

zh-CN: 你孤单的时候，可以随时给我电话。
en-US: if you are ever lonely you can call me , anytime , anywhere .

en-US: no matter the ending is perfect or not , you cannot disappear from my world .

zh-CN: 知识不能取代友谊，即使变成笨蛋我也不愿意失去你，海绵宝宝。
en-US: knowledge can't replace friendship , i'd rather be an idiot than lose you , spongebob .

zh-CN: 知道自己不能做什么远比知道自己能做什么重要。
en-US: knowing what you can not do is more important than knowing what you can do .

zh-CN: 悲哀和烦恼不是使人心软，就是使人心狠。
en-US: sorrow and trouble either soften the heart or harden it .

zh-CN: 趁着年轻就应该做一些今后再也没胆量做的事情。

zh-CN: 多关心一下自己的父母吧，我们总忙着自己成长，却忘了他们也在变老。
en-US: love your parents. we are too busy growing up yet we forget that they are already growing old .
